Soul City Slice Shop
We are now open. We have a pool table, vinyl records for sale, and oh yeah, we make and serve pizza.
Delivery
and
Takeout
are now available. Please be aware that on Fridays and Saturdays we sometimes get inundated with orders and have to temporarily turn Online Ordering off. Paulie Gee’s Soul City Gift Certificates are available for purchase in store only and can only be used in Philadelphia.
We are always on the lookout for passionate, dedicated, skilled employees to join the team at Paulie Gee’s. Contact us at jobs@pauliegee.com.

TOP ^
TAKE OUT/DELIVERY OPTIONS
Delivery
To Go
TOP ^
FAQ
What type of pizza do you serve?
Traditional New York style slices and whole pies, including square pies as well as round.
Do you have vegan options?
Yes, we do have vegan pies and slices available, both round and square.
Do you have gluten free options?
We do not offer gluten-free options.
Do you serve alcohol?
We have a full bar.
Do you make the pizzeria available for private events or “buyouts”?
So as not to inconvenience other guests we do not.
Do you sell vinyl records?
Yes! We have a curated selection of amazing vinyl of artists from the 70’s and 80’s. Our vinyl is priced in tiers and can be purchased at the register.
Are you hiring?
Yes! We are always on the lookout for passionate, dedicated, skilled employees to join the team at Paulie Gee’s. Contact us at jobs@pauliegee.com.
When do you open?
We are now open daily.
We have a pool table, vinyl records for sale, and oh yeah, we make and serve pizza.

raw_text:

DINNER
SNACKS & SPREADS
MEDITERRANEAN OLIVES (5)

sea salt, grilled french country bread
TANGERINE AND RICOTTA TOAST (12)
satsuma tangerines, pickled long hots, pistachio, mint, sour honey, coriander
ROASTED MUSHROOM ARANCINI (11)
caputo brothers smoked mozzarella, green garlic aioli, parmesan, black pepper
BOARDS
HOUSE MADE CHARCUTERIE BOARD (17)
with baguette and seeded flatbread
·speck alta adige with black garlic mustard
·mortadella with cipolinni sotto aceto
·saucisson sec with cornichons
·pork and cider rillettes with sour fennel
CHEESE BOARD (17)
with baguette and seeded flatbread
·etxegarai, raw sheep, spanish basque, apple & date butter
·cherry grove toma, raw cow, nj with cranberry mostarda
·malghese, cow + sheep, lombardia, meyer lemon marmalade
·birchrun blue, raw cow, pa with pear and cardamom jam
SALADS & VEGETABLES
BLOOD ORANGE AND FENNEL SALAD (13)
castelfranco raddichio, almonds, castelvetrano olives, fennel pollen, royer mountain
CHARRED LOCAL BROCCOLI (13)
tonnato sauce, crispy garlic, preserved swiss chard stems, radish, celery leaf

brussel sprouts, hazelnut picada, brown butter, parsley, cumin, lemon
KOHLRABI CAESAR (14)
crispy pork belly, anchovy aioli, herb salad, garlic breadcrumbs, parmigiano reggiano

avocado green goddess, spring greens, cashews, green garlic, sour turnips, cilantro
PIZZA
MARGHERITA (14)
san marzanos, house stretched fior di latte, parmesan,
basil & extra virgin olive oil

'nduja, garlic, san marzano tomato, buffalo mozzarella fermented chile, fresh oregano, local honey
PATATE (16)
local new potatoes, mozzarella, sweet onions, thyme, parsley, finger lakes gold
FUNGHI (16)
roasted local mushrooms, swiss chard, garlic, smoked mozzarella, thyme
UOVO (17)
brussel sprouts, secret white sauce, guanciale, parmesan, fior di latte, truffled local egg
SALSICCIA (17)
wood-roasted fennel, san marzano tomatoes, mozzarella, house-made garlic sausage, basil, parmesan
ADD:
arugula (2), wood roasted mushrooms (3), sausage (3), prosciutto di parma (4)

black pepper, garlic bread crumbs
BARLEY AND KABOCHA SQUASH MEZZALUNA (17)
nantucket lightship scallops, lemon, braised leeks, almonds, balsamic condimento, sage
PAN SEARED GNOCCHI (16)
guanciale, local mushrooms, tuscan kale, porcini, parmesan
LOCALLY MILLED SPELT TAGLIATELLE (17)
braised duck legs, cabbage, cocoa, parmesan, foie gras butter
TUFOLI (15)
sunday supper pork ragu, broccoli rabe, basil, provolone picante, herbed pangrattato
PLATES
GRILLED SPANISH OCTOPUS (15)
cantimpalo chorizo, fingerlings, cucumber, taggiasca olive, roasted peppers, fennel soubise, herbs
CACIOCAVALLO STUFFED MEATBALLS (12)
house ground shortrib & pork meatballs, sicilian oregano, pickled pepper relish, grilled bread
VENTIAN SHELLFISH RISOTTO (25)
fennel soffritto, shrimp, mussels, prosecco, lemon, salsa verde
PORCINI CRUSTED HANGER STEAK (24)
charred cauliflower, black garlic, balsamic condimento, shaved parmesan
MEDITERRANEAN BRONZINO (23)
olive oil-crushed new potatoes, green olive salsa verde, radish, parsley, lemon

CLASSIC ITALIAN AMERICAN
REIMAGINED.
MARLTON
OCEAN CASINO RESORT

PRINCETON
7TH & CHESTNUT
UNIVERSITY CITY
VILLANOVA
NEWTOWN SQUARE
WEST CHESTER
NORTHEAST PHILADELPHIA
UPPER DUBLIN
Our
inspiration
In 1920, on a ship named The Italia, my grandparents
traveled from Calabria, Italy to Philadelphia
with only a few pennies in their pockets.
Francesco and Tommasina Rocchino
worked incredibly hard, raised a large
family, loved their South Philadelphia
neighborhood deeply, and never
hesitated to lend a hand to fellow
immigrants especially during the war.
Over time they built two successful
businesses, Rocchino & Sons a corner
deli & grocery store legendary for
grandmom’s fresh pastas & sandwiches,
and a construction company through which
my grandpop built many of the
neighborhood’s row houses with
great attention to detail and quality.
My grandparents and their beautiful daughter Rosemary LaScala, my mother, are my inspiration every day! I honor their passion, their integrity, and their drive in all I do.
On behalf of my team at the LaScala
Restaurant
Group and I, we thank you
for making it
possible for us to do
what we love…we hope to
see you soon,
let’s eat!
—
Rob LaScala, Restaurateur, Owner

VIP

(We may not be able to accommodate all dietary restrictions but please call the restaurant ahead of time to confirm)
Scallop Toast
FIRST
Bread service, Salmon Chirashi,
Scallop Toast
SECOND
Tuna Carpaccio
THIRD
Grilled Black Cod
FOURTH
Fish of the Day Entree
FIFTH
Dessert
A LA CARTE
Bread Service  7
Mighty Bread baguette, furikake butter, gochigaru
Oyster of the Day  4
Served on the halfshell, watermelon mignonette
Salmon Chirashi  28
Sushi rice, finger chili, cucumber, smoked trout roe, nori
Scallop Toast  26
Shaved raw scallops dressed in chili oil, soy, chives on buttery sesame toast
Shrimp Wonton Soup  26
Green tea dashi, spicy pork oil, shimeji mushroom, wakame
Grilled Hamachi Collar  30
Gochujang, sesame, pineapple celtuce kimchi
Zucchini Pesto Fazzoletti  33
Jumbo lump crab, cherry tomato, trout roe, pine nuts, pecorino
Steamed Halibut  45
Kimchi peanut broth, Chinese broccoli, shiitakes, potatoes
Grilled Branzino  46
Brussels sprouts, honeynut squash, rosemary, grapes, pepitas
--
Dessert of the Day
--
* Contains pork
Monday through Thursday the prix-fixe menu is available to all parties and features highlights from our rotating menu. Prix-fixe is 5 courses for $100 per person.
Fridays and Saturdays are prix-fixe only flat seatings for $115 per person.
Prix-fixe menu is mandatory for parties of 5 or larger.

We offer a pasta-centric menu with a selection of antipasti, pasta, and desserts. Our menu frequently changes, but you will find the latest updates by clicking below.

our upstairs dining option offers a preset tasting menu curated by our chefs. beverages are served a la carte.

Di Bruno Bros. of Wayne, PA
An expansive gourmet grocery with produce, meats, and our legendary cheese and charcuterie counters, plus a cafe, Roman-style pizza, Bar Alimentari restaurant and Focacceria sandwich shop. Available for private events.
Address
375 W. Lancaster Ave. — Wayne, PA 19087
Store Hours
Mon - Sat 7:00 am – 8:00 pm | Sun 7:00 am – 7:00 pm
Contact Details
Phone - 484-581-7888
Learn More
Get Directions
Di Bruno Bros. at Rittenhouse Square
Our largest and most diverse location has our famous cheese cave, charcuterie, fresh meats and seafood, produce, grocery, and prepared foods to go. Rittenhouse also features an Italian bake shop, cafe, full bar, and our Alimentari restaurant and Focacceria. Available for private events.
Address
1730 Chestnut Street — Philadelphia, PA 19103
Store Hours
Mon - Sat 7:00 am – 8:00 pm | Sun 7:00 am – 7:00 pm
Contact Details
Phone - 215-665-9220
Learn More
Get Directions
Di Bruno Bros. at the Italian Market
Our original storefront since 1939, lovingly known as The House of Cheese for our expansive cheese cave, you'll find wall to wall delicacies filling the shop's tiny 300-square-foot space.
Address
930 S. 9th Street — Philadelphia, PA 19147
Store Hours
Mon - Fri 9:00 am – 6:00 pm | Sat - Sun 8:00 am – 5:00 pm
Contact Details
Phone - 215-922-2876
Learn More
Get Directions
Di Bruno Bros. at Ardmore Farmer's Market
A "mini mercato" of sorts, our streamlined version of our famous gourmet grocery has our signature cheese counter plus deli meats, a charcuterie counter, bagel bar, prepared foods and meals, coffee, Focacceria sandwiches, and pizza.
Address
120 Coulter Avenue — Ardmore, PA 19003
Store Hours
Mon - Sat 7:00 am – 6:00 pm | Sun 7:00 am – 4:00 pm
Contact Details
Phone - 484-416-3311
Learn More
Get Directions
Di Bruno Bros. Bottle Shop at the Italian market
A destination where a discerning drinker can find craft beers, an eclectic wine selection, and aperitivi supplies.
Address
920 S. 9th St. —  Philadelphia, PA, 19147
Store Hours
Mon - Thur 12:00 pm – 7:00 pm | Fri - Sat 11:00 am – 8:00 pm | Sun 11:00 am – 6:00 pm
Contact Details
Phone - 215-560-8745
Learn More
Get Directions
Di Bruno Bros. at The Franklin
A European-style grocery, coffee bar, sandwich shop, and petite bottle shop, all surrounding our signature cheese cave, charcuterie counter, and specialty grocery offerings.
Address
834 Chestnut Street — Philadelphia, PA 19107
Store Hours
Mon - Fri 7:00 am – 6:00 pm | Sat - Sun 8:00 am – 4:00 pm
Contact Details
Phone - 267-519-3115
Learn More
Get Directions
Join us for an event
Experience Di Bruno Bros. in a whole new light. Join us for "Meet the Maker" events, culinary workshops, and exclusive after-hours experiences. We also offer private event spaces in our restaurants and cafes, perfect for celebrations and gatherings.
Browse our available experiences below.

name: Dom & Mia's
raw_text:
Menus | Dom & Mia's
Home
Menus
Special Events
Order Online
Gift Cards
About Us
Dom & Mia's
Our Menus
Our menus are developed so everyone can gather over classic cocktails and modern dishes. Each dish served and spirit poured is to pay tribute to our family, past and present.
Dinner Menu
Delight in our exquisite antipasto offerings, a testament to authentic Italian flavors. Dive into specialties like Stuffed Long Hots or the creamy Eggplant Rollatini. Our insalada section promises fresh blends, and the pizza choices are a harmonious mix of tradition and taste. For the mains, whether it's the Chicken Piccata or Ribeye, each dish is a culinary journey in itself.
Drink Menu
Quench your thirst with our extensive drink menu, featuring a range of beverages to suit every palate. Whether you're in the mood for a classic cocktail, a refreshing mocktail, or a glass of fine wine, we have something for everyone. Our bartenders also craft seasonal specials, ensuring there's always something new to try.
Dessert Menu
End your meal on a sweet note with our delightful dessert offerings. From the rich and creamy "Cheesecake" to the innovative "Spumoni Bomba", our desserts are the perfect blend of tradition and innovation. Pair with a cup of coffee or a dessert wine for the ultimate indulgence.
Happy Hour
Delight in our Happy Hour featuring tasty appetizers like Fire Roasted Wings and Calamari, complemented by affordable Draft Beer and House Wine. Ideal for both early evenings and late-night gatherings!
Dom & Mia's
145 Saxer Ave, Springfield, PA 19064

Our promise to you
30-day money back guarantee
HugeDomains provides a 100% satisfaction guarantee on every domain name that we sell through our website. If you buy a domain and are unhappy with it, we will accept the return within 30 days and issue a full refund – no questions asked.
Quick delivery of the domain
In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
Safe and secure shopping
Your online safety and security is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information.
We protect your information through SSL encryption technology, providing the safest, most secure shopping experience possible. Additionally, you may checkout with PayPal or Escrow.com.
FAQs
See more FAQs
How do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy?
Yes, you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process, it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain.
Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred.
For transfer instructions to GoDaddy, please
click here
.
How do I get the domain after the purchase?
Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar, NameBright.com, we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
What comes with the domain name?
Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee, however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.
Do you offer payment plans?
Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months.
See details
.
How do I keep my personal information private?
If you wish the domain ownership information to be private, add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public.
To add privacy protection to your domain, do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year, and then for a small fee for subsequent years.
Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update, and different registrars are faster than others. Usually your Whois information will be fully updated within two days.

☕️ Sweet afternoons just got even sweeter at TingTing’s 🍞🍰✨
Need a mid-day pick-me-up? Join us for our Afternoon Tea Special — available Monday to Friday, 3–5 PM — and treat yourself to a delicious duo for just $10! 😍
🍹
Your choice of:
– Hong Kong Style Milk Tea
– Lemon Black Tea
🍮
Plus one dessert:
– Peanut butter stuffed French toast
– Matcha Cheese Tiramisu
Cozy, comforting, and wallet-friendly — because you deserve a little joy between lunch and dinner 💛
Appetizers
Soy Glazed Crispy Chicken Wings (6pc)	酱油蜜汁脆皮鸡翅
【Can't be GF】Crispy fried chicken wings, glazed with honey, soy, and minced garlic. garnish with chopped scallions & roasted sesame seeds.
Five Spice Crispy Chicken Wings (6pc)	五香炸鸡翅
Spice Level: 1/3. Crispy fried chicken wings. (Already Gluten Free)
Crispy Calamari Rings a la Sichuan Style/wachili sauce 	川味香脆鱿鱼圈佐芥末甜辣酱
Spice Level: 1/3. 【Can't be GF】Crispy tempura calamari rings, tossing together with MaLa seasoning, serving with wasabi sweet chili sauce.
Spicy Popcorn Chicken	香辣鸡米花佐蒜香蛋黄酱
Spice Level: 1/3. Crispy popcorn chicken (chicken breast), tossed together with mixed spicy seasoning, served with garlic aioli on the side. (Already Gluten Free)
Grilled Hamachi Kama 烤𫚕鱼下巴
【Can't be GF】Perfectly charred and seasoned, offering tender, flavorful meat with a crispy finish, drizzle with unagi sauce & spicy aioli, serve with lemon wedge.
Mussels with Spicy Coconut Broth  椰香辣汁青口贝
Spice Level: 1/3. Fresh mussels simmered in a fragrant coconut broth infused with red curry, served with toasted bread.
Loaded Sweet Potato Fries 豪华炸红薯条
Crispy sweet potato fries, loaded with diced crispy bacons, shredded cheese, spicy aioli, and scallions. (Already Gluten Free)
Fried Calamari Caesar Salad 私房香脆鱿鱼凯撒沙拉
【Can't be GF】Crispy tempura calamari on top of romain lettuce with spicy caesar dressing.
Avocado, Tomato and Cucumber Salad	牛油果沙拉
Avocado, cherry tomato an English cucumber salad with Yuzu miso vinaigrette.  (Already Gluten Free)
Cucumber Salad with Spicy Toasted Sesame Dressing	椒香芝酱拌青瓜
Spice Level: 1/3. 【Can't be GF】Chilled English cucumber salad with fragrant chili sesame dressing.
Satay (2) 烤串（2串）
【Can't be GF】Grilled beef or chicken (chicken breast) skewers with peanut satay sauce. (2 skewers per order)
Clam Chowder 蛤蜊汤
Creamy New England style of clam chowder. (Already Gluten Free)
Entrees
Black Char Siu Rice Bowl w Fried Eggs & Yu Choy 太阳蛋黑叉烧饭
【Can't be GF】Black char siu, sunny side up, and Yu Choy over steamed rice.
Curry Beef Brisket	咖喱牛腩
【Can't be GF】Beef brisket stewed in curry with potatoes, topped with cilantro & scallions.
BBQ Unagi & Scrambled Egg over Rice 鳗鱼滑蛋饭
【Can't be GF】Soft and creamy scrambled eegs over steamed rice, top with grilled eel, drizzle with rich & savory sauce.
Chicken Cutlet Gratin with Curry 	芝士焗咖喱炸鸡扒饭
【Can't be GF】Melted cheese with crispy chicken cutlet (chicken breast) over rice with curry sauce, served with steamed Yu Choy.
Baked Creamy Seafood Over Fried Rice 海鲜芝士焗炒饭
Shrimps, clams, and squids in rich creamy cheese sauce over golden fried rice. Baked until golden and bubbly. (Already Gluten Free)
Pork Chop Gratin with Tomato Sauce	芝士焗炸猪扒饭
Melted cheese over crispy pork chop with tomato sauce over rice, served with steamed Yu Choy. (Already Gluten Free)
Cheese Baked Macaroni & Bolognese 芝士焗肉酱通粉
Backed macaroni with bolognese and lots cheese.
Pan-Seared Barramundi Fillet	香煎金目鲈鱼排
Crispy skin and tender barramundi fillet, served with a spicy olive, capers, and anchovy tomato sauce.
Eggs & Sandwiches
Spicy Chicken Cutlet Sandwich (No Fries)	辣酱鸡扒包
Spice Level: 1/3. 【Can't be GF】Crispy fried chicken cutlet (chicken breast), tossed with spicy sauce. Note: Includes Spicy Mayo.
Kobe-Style Smashed Burger (No Fries)	神户风手打汉堡
Spice Level: 1/3. 【Can't be GF】Perfectly smashed patty top with melted cheese, and tempura bacon, serve together with lettuce & tomato.  Note: Includes Spicy Mayo.
Fried Pork Chop Bao (No Fries)	猪扒包
Spice Level: 1/3. 【Can't be GF】Fried pork toast bun, lettuce & tomato. Note: Includes Spicy Mayo.
Impossible Burger (No Fries)	素汉堡
Spice Level: 1/3. 【Can't be GF】Impossible patty, lettuce, tomato, and avocado. Note: Includes Spicy Mayo.
Scrambled Egg Sandwich with Fries	滑蛋三明治
【Can't be GF】Fluffy scrambled eggs nestled in a bun, served with fries — simple, satisfying comfort food.
Char Siu Scallion Omelette & Rice 葱香叉烧欧姆蛋
【Can't be GF】A savory three-egg omelette stuffed with char siu and fresh scallions. then drizzle with umami loaded soy glaze. serve with rice.
Peanut butter stuffed French toast	西多士
【Can't be GF】French toast with peanut butter filling and drizzle with condensed milk. Peanut Allergy.
Pastas
Chicken Spaghetti 	黑椒鸡肉意面
Chicken (chicken breast), mixed veggies with black pepper mushroom sauce.
Seafood Spaghetti	海鲜意面
Shrimps, clams, squid, and mixed veggies with white creamy sauce.
Black Pepper Beef Spaghetti 黑椒牛肉意面
Beef & mixed veggies with black pepper mushroom sauce.
Spicy Kimchi Bacon Spaghetti 辣泡菜培根意面
Spice Level: 2/3. Bacon, squid, mixed veggies, Korean spicy kimchi creamy sauce.
Creamy Cod Roe Seafood Udon 奶油鱼籽海鲜乌冬面
【Can't be GF】Udon noodle sautéed with white creamy sauce, cod roe, shrimps, clams & squid.
Beef Meatball Spaghetti 牛肉丸子意面
Beef meatballs & mixed veggies with meat marinara sauce.
Squid Ink Spaghetti with Seafood	海鲜墨鱼面
【Can't be GF】Shrimps, clams, squid & mixed veggies with squid ink spaghetti.
Mushroom Pasta	菌菇意面
【Can't be GF】Mixed mushrooms spaghetti with dashi soy sauce.
Side Vegetables
Black Truffle Fries	黑松露薯条
(Already Gluten Free)
Sautéed Mushrooms 	炒杂菇
Mixed mushrooms sauteed with garlic. (Already Gluten Free)
Fried Brussels Sprouts 炸甘蓝
【Can't be GF】Fried Brussels sprouts, tossed with garlic, scallions, and Parmesan.
Yu Choy in Oyster Sauce 蚝油菜心
【Can't be GF】Blanched Yu Choy with savory garlic oyster sauce.
Sweet Potato Fries 	 炸红薯条
(Already Gluten Free)
French Fries 薯条
(Already Gluten Free)
Pickled Daikon 醋渍萝卜
(Already Gluten Free)
Desserts
Mango & Grapefruit Sago Cake 杨枝甘露蛋糕
A refreshing layered dessert made with sponge cake, mango, grapefruit, mango cream, and light coconut mousse, topped with mango popping pearls.
Lychee & Rose Cake 	荔枝玫瑰蛋糕
Soft sponge cake layered with lychee cream and a touch of rose.
Peach & Jasmine Cloud Cake	白桃茉莉云朵蛋糕
Fluffy jasmine-infused cake layered with sweet summer peach and whipped jasmine white chocolate cream. A seasonal blend of fruit and florals.
Mango Cloud Cake	芒果云朵蛋糕
Light and airy chiffon cake layered with fresh mango, whipped cream, and silky mango mousse. Finished with a cloud of fluffy cream and juicy mango cubes.
Walnut and Dark Chocolate Cookies	核桃黑巧克力曲奇 1pc
Homemade with 70% chocolate and walnut.
Matcha Cheese Tiramisu 抹茶芝士提拉米苏
Portuguese Custard Tart 葡式蛋挞
Strawberry Cheesecake	草莓芝士蛋糕
Drinks
Passionfruit Lime Jasmine 百香果青柠茉莉花茶
Jasmine Lychee Breeze 茉莉荔香微风冰茶
Hong Kong Style Milk Tea (Hot/Cold) 丝袜奶茶 热/冰
Thai Iced Tea 泰式冰茶
Milk Tea with Coffee (Hot/Cold) 鸳鸯奶茶 热/冰
Lemon Black Tea (Hot/Cold) 热柠茶/冻柠茶
Hot Chocolate 热巧克力
Hot Tea 热茶
Espresso 浓缩咖啡
Americano (Hot/Cold) 美式咖啡 热/冰
Latte (Hot/Cold) 拿铁 热/冰
Cappuccino 卡布奇诺

Looking to apply for a career at Estia?
Start Your Application
Visiting & Dress Code
Here at Estia we ask all of our guest to dress their best!  As we aim to create a comfortable and inclusive environment for all, Estia does not permit sleeveless tee-shirts, cut-off shorts, or exposed undergarments. This policy is in place to maintain a respectful and professional atmosphere within our organization. We appreciate your cooperation in adhering to these guidelines.
* Estia reserves the right to turn away anyone not dressed properly to dine at our restaurants. Thank you!
Accepted Payment Methods
* We DO NOT accept Discover, Apple pay, or any form of Visa/Mastercard gifts cards.
Estia Restaurant Menus
Experience the true flavors of the Greek Mediterranean right here in Philadelphia, PA. We serve fresh, flavorful dishes crafted to satisfy any craving. Complement your meal with a selection from our exceptional wine list or specialty cocktail menu. Join us and let your culinary journey across the sea begin!

We do not accept credit merchant gift cards as payment. Payment must be made in cash, Estia Group gift card, Visa, Mastercard, or American Express.
Upcoming Promotions
Come join and be a part of our family! See what promotions we have each day and week. We offer happy hour during the weekdays, 2-3 course meals and more. Click each promotion to learn more about what we have to offer!

Italian Restaurant Menu: Savor the Flavors of Gnocchi's Cuisine
Modification is available for most dishes. Please alert your server to your dietary needs
Menu / Price List
ANTIPASTI
A vibrant platter featuring an artful selection of artisanal Italian cured meats, rich cheeses, briny olives, and tangy marinated vegetables, complemented by fresh seasonal fruit and crusty breadsticks. This shareable appetizer offers a delightful balance of salty, sweet, and savory flavors, perfect for stimulating the appetite before your meal
Bruschetta
$12
Toasted Italian bread topped with diced Roma tomatoes, fresh basil, mozzarella, parmesan cheese and drizzled with balsamic reduction.
Caesar Salad
$12
Fresh romaine, croutons, shaved parmesan, homemade dressing
Insalata Mista
$14
Spring mixed salad. Mixed greens, carrots, tomatoes and balsamic vinaigrette.
Arugula Salad
$16
A peppery bed of fresh arugula tossed in a simple lemon vinaigrette, topped with salty, nutty shavings of Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
Burrata
$16
A luscious ball of creamy burrata served over a bed of ripe heirloom and cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of rich olive oil and balsamic glaze
Chicken and Beef Meatballs
$16
Polpette Misto
Our signature meatballs are a mouthwatering blend of ground chicken and beef, seasoned with fresh Italian herbs, garlic, and grated Parmesan cheese. Simmered for hours in our slow-cooked, rustic marinara sauce, they are served over a bed of al dente spaghetti and finished with a sprinkle of fresh parsley and more Parmesan.
Carciofi
$16
Artichokes with stem, sliced in half and grilled, flavored with extra-virgin olive oil, salt and herbs
Portobello mushrooms
$16
Grilled Portobello mushroom cap topped with smoked mozzarella, over baby arugula tossed in our house vinaigrette, topped with balsamic glaze
Melanzane
$16
A version typical of the hinterlands of Naples with its eggplant dipped in egg and fried, then layered with mozzarella, Parmigiano  Reggiano and tomato sauce and baked in a hot oven until bubbly and golden brown on top
Organic Mussels
$18
Fresh, organic mussels steamed in a savory broth of white wine, garlic, and fresh parsley. Served with toasted baguette slices for dipping.
GNOCCHI
If you love that pillowy potato pasta as much as we do, we’ve gathered up some of our best gnocchi recipes to share. You can never have enough gnocchi recipes.
Gnocchi Olio e Aglio
$20
Handmade Potato gnocchi tossed in a simple, rustic sauce of sautéed garlic and high-quality olive oil, finished with fresh parsley and a sprinkle of Parmesan
Gnocchi Marinara
$20
Handmade Potato gnocchi, simmered in our rustic, slow-cooked tomato and garlic sauce. Garnished with torn basil leaves and a sprinkle of aged Parmesan
Gnocchi Primavera
$20
Handmade potato gnocchi with seasonal vegetables, including asparagus, peas, and roasted cherry tomatoes, in a light lemon-parmesan cream sauce
Gnocchi Alfredo
$22
Handmade potato gnocchi tossed in a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce made with butter, heavy cream, and Parmesan cheese
Gnocchi alla Vodka
$22
Handmade  potato gnocchi in a creamy, house-made vodka and tomato sauce, finished with grated Pecorino Romano
Gnocchi Bolognese
$24
Handmade potato gnocchi tossed in a hearty, slow-simmered meat sauce and topped with grated Parmesan cheese
Gnocchi  Lamb Ragu
$26
Handmade  potato gnocchi served with a rich, slow-braised lamb ragu and finished with pecorino cheese
Gnocchi Meatball
$26
Handmade potato gnocchi tossed in a slow-simmered San Marzano tomato sauce with savory, hand-rolled beef meatballs. Topped with fresh basil and grated Parmigiano-Reggiano
Gnocchi Shrimp Scampi
$26
Handmade  potato gnocchi and shrimp tossed in a garlic, white wine, and butter sauce and finished with pecorino cheese
Gnocchi Shrimp Fra Diavolo
$26
Plump shrimp and delicate handmade potato gnocchi tossed in a fiery, rich tomato sauce with garlic, crushed red pepper, and fresh herbs and finished with pecorino cheese
PASTA
At Gnocchi Restaurant, our pasta is our standout dish.  it is imported from Messina "Italy",  and made with the finest imported flour and farm-fresh eggs, making it a true highlight
Linguine Olio e Aglio
$18
A timeless classic of linguine tossed in fragrant garlic-infused extra virgin olive oil with a pinch of red pepper flakes ,fresh parsley and finished with
grated Parmesan cheese. Simple yet deeply flavorful.
Linguine Cacio e Pepe
$18
A classic Roman dish of linguine coated in a simple, silky sauce of Pecorino Romano cheese and freshly cracked black pepper
Linguine Marinara
$18
Linguine, draped in a rich, slow-simmered marinara sauce made with vine-ripened tomatoes, garlic, onions, and fresh herbs. finished with pecorino cheese
Penne Primavera
$18
Assortment of mixed vegetables sautéed in a garlic butter sauce, tossed in penne pasta. Topped with parmesan cheese
Linguine  Alfredo
$20
Linguine pasta in a rich, house-made parmesan cream sauce, finished with grated Pecorino Romano
Penne alla Vodka
$20
Penne pasta in a creamy tomato sauce with a hint of vodka, finished with Parmesan cheese and fresh basil
Linguine Meatball
$24
Homemade beef meatballs served over fresh linguine with a classic marinara sauce and finished with
grated Parmesan cheese
Penne Lamb Ragu
$24
A slow-simmered ragù of tender lamb, aromatic sofrito, and San Marzano tomatoes, tossed with al dente penne pasta and topped with freshly grated Pecorino Romano.
Linguine Shrimp Scampi
$26
A timeless Italian favorite of plump shrimp sautéed in a garlicky butter sauce with a splash of white wine, lemon, and fresh parsley, all tossed with linguine pasta and  finished with pecorino cheese
Linguine Shrimp Fra Diavolo
$26
A classic for spice lovers. Plump shrimps are simmered in a bold and spicy tomato sauce with garlic,
tossed with linguine, finished with fresh parsley and pecorino cheese
ENTREES
Our Entree dishes ensure that every bite reflects the true flavors of Italy
Chicken Parmigiana
$22
A breaded chicken cutlet, fried to a golden crisp, and baked with fresh marinara sauce, melted mozzarella, and grated parmesan cheese
Chicken Piccata
$24
Tender, thinly pounded chicken breasts, pan-seared to a golden brown and finished in a silky lemon-butter sauce with capers and a touch of white wine
Chicken Marsala
$24
Tender chicken breasts, lightly floured and sautéed to a golden brown, served in a luscious Marsala wine sauce with cremini mushrooms, garlic, and shallots. Finished with a touch of butter and fresh parsley
Veal Parmigiana
$24
Tender, breaded veal cutlet baked with homemade marinara sauce, melted mozzarella, and grated Parmesan
Veal Piccata
$26
Tender veal  scallopini, lightly dusted in flour and pan-fried, served in a tangy, fragrant sauce featuring fresh lemon, butter, and capers. Garnished with parsley and a final squeeze of fresh lemon
Veal Marsala
$26
Thinly pounded veal cutlets, lightly dredged in seasoned flour and pan-seared until golden. Finished in a savory reduction of Marsala wine, wild mushrooms, shallots, and fresh parsley
Dessert
The sweetest way to end your meal. Our desserts are a must-try. A slice of heaven in every bite
Homemade Tiramisu
$9
A rich, authentic Italian dessert featuring layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and sweet mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa
Panna Cotta
$8
A classic Italian dessert of sweetened cooked cream, molded and served chilled. It's perfectly complemented by a rich berry coulis and garnished with fresh mint
Limoncello Mascarpone Cake
$8
A moist lemon sponge cake layered with rich Italian mascarpone cream and finished with delicate white chocolate curls
Cheese Cake
$7
A velvety-smooth, baked cheesecake with a buttery cookie crust, generously topped with seasonal fresh fruit and a sweet glaze
Carrot Cake
$7
A timeless favorite featuring a moist spice cake loaded with shredded carrots, chopped walnuts, and a hint of warm cinnamon. Finished with a rich and tangy cream cheese frosting
Chocolate Cake
$7
Layers of rich, velvety chocolate cake with a tight crumb, filled and frosted with a luxurious homemade chocolate buttercream.
SOFT DRINKS
Coke -Diet Coke - Sprite
$3
Cheery Temple
$3
Lemonade -Ice tea
$3
HOT DRINKS
American Coffee / DecaF
$3

$4

$4

$5
Side Dishes Add-on
Can be added and ordered on the side

Choose your protein: grilled chicken, sautéed shrimp, or savory beef meatballs

Dine with us
Make a Reservation
Photo by
Colleen McHugh
Your Event At Irwin’s
Whether you’re looking to host a party, a sit down dinner, or an Apero Hour at the bar with Sicilian snacks + sips, we want to curate a personalized evening for you.
Learn More
Salvatore’s Counter
Salvatore’s Counter offers 4 seats nestled between the bar and the kitchen pass on Sunday evening’s at Irwin’s. Parties of 2 or 4 can reserve seats for this dinner, seated at 6:00pm. Chef Michael Vincent Ferreri will prepare a unique, one of a kind, 10 course menu. Abundant with special touches and surprises, this experience is rooted in boundless creativity and stellar hospitality.
As each course moves gently into the next Chef Michael shares stories and traditions that inspired the meal prepared just for you. Each beverage pairing is unique to each menu, and carries a story much like the food. As the allocated wines and spirits are presented, the story of your evening continues to weave while you hear about where they came from, who made them, and why they sing with that dish so well.
10 course menu, $250 pp
Beverage Pairing, $150 pp (optional)
Reservations for Salvatore’s Counter open up via Resy at 11:00am on the first of month. For example, on February 1st at 11:00am reservations will open for March.
Make a Reservation
lOCATION
800 Mifflin Street, Philadelphia PA
INFO
215-693-6206
hello@irwinsupstairs.com
HOURS
Wednesday-Sunday
5-10PM
ACCESS
The entrance to Irwin's is located at
800 Mifflin Street at the building entrance closest to 8th Street
. This door will be open during business hours or a member of our team will be there to greet you and show you the way to the elevator to the 8th floor.
We do not have access to the Southwark School parking lot. If you are driving to Irwin’s, please allow time prior to your reservation to find street parking, which can sometimes be tricky in South Philly after 5pm!
The terrace is open seasonally. Seating availability is weather dependent.
POLICIES
Reservations cancelled less than 24 hours in advance may incur a $30pp cancellation fee.
All parties of 5 or more are required to take part in the Chef's Tasting Menu for $90pp.
A 2% Health in Hospitality Charge is implemented at Irwin's to support full health care benefits for our staff, along with PTO, research and development among the team, and mental health wellness.
Our Story
Chef Michael Vincent Ferreri moved to Philadelphia in 2011 where he worked for acclaimed chefs such as Jose Garces at Tinto, Michael Solomonov at Zahav, and Joey Baldino at Zeppoli. It was at Zeppoli that the seed of Ferreri’s love affair with treating beautiful ingredients simply started to blossom into his expression of Modern Sicilian Cuisine. After opening Aldine with Chef George Sabatino, Ferreri moved on to write his first menu at Res Ipsa. The years at Res Ipsa were the sounding board for many accolades to come.
In 2017 Res Ipsa was named among Bon Appetit’s Top 50 Best New Restaurants. In March 2019 Ferreri fulfilled a lifelong dream to cook a beautiful meal in the kitchen at The James Beard House, for none other occasion than The Feast of Saint Giussepe. Also in 2019 Ferreri was named among Philadelphia’s Star Chefs Rising Stars. In our first year open at Irwin’s, 2021, Esquire named Irwin’s as one of the Best New Restaurants in America. Just a year later in 2022, Bon Appetit recognized Irwin’s as one of the top 10 Best New Restaurants.
Chef Michael Vincent Ferreri’s cuisine celebrates the seasons and the farmers that harvest the best of their terroir. Ferreri is thrilled to find a home at Irwin’s, and to showcase his love for natural wine. The menu highlights seafood, hand made pasta, and the traditions of Sicily.

name: Pizzeria Salvy
raw_text:
Pizzeria Salvy – – Marc Vetri Pizzeria
Reservations
DELIVERY NOW AVAILABLE!
ORDER HERE
!
“Pizzeria Salvy is my father’s Philadelphia story. It’s a story of persistence and perseverance. It’s a story of my childhood, and all the flavors and experiences I remember.” – Marc Vetri
The latest from acclaimed Chef Marc Vetri, Pizzeria Salvy borrows its name from Marc’s beloved father, Sal. “My father has been at the center of everything when it comes to my restaurant career,” says Marc. “From the meatballs to the family meals he has made for the last 25 years, it’s only fitting that we dedicate this project to him.
Pizzeria Salvy offers a curated selection of 12-inch pizzas, as well as specialty taglio slices. Salads, seasonal vegetables, and (of course) Sal’s Meatballs round out a menu inspired by heritage and heart, family and Philadelphia.
Sal's Rules to Live By
Always work for yourself - no matter what, be the boss.
Always use veal, pork and beef in meatballs.
Always have integrity - you are only as good as your word.
Work with Us
Pizzeria Salvy is a nurturing environment where one can learn and grow. The hospitality that is extended to our guests is the same hospitality you will experience as a member of our team! At Pizzeria Salvy, our cultural pillars are People, Hospitality, Authenticity, Collaboration and Details. We are always looking for people who are passionate about food and beverage, and who want to learn more. If you are interested in joining our team, we would love to hear from you – please email us your resume and tell us about yourself.
careers@pizzeriasalvy.com

About the Business
Harvest Seasonal Grill features a local, farm to table menu with many items that are below 500 calories in an upscale casual atmosphere. Every three months, we update our menu to celebrate the new flavors that accompany the change in seasons. We also offer 50+ wines by the glass, as well as a growing selection of local and organic beers.

At Harvest, we believe that where your food comes from is as important as what you eat, which is why we champion the ideology of 'know your farmer, know your food'. We work with over 75 local farmers to source the freshest and highest quality products available. Our mission of sustainability and green living is carried through every facet of what we do, from our menu to our decor, and even the cleaning products that we use are eco-friendly.
…
Read more

It's showing as a dog friendly restaurant. Would I be able to bring my 7 month old puppy?
A:
We are dog friendly on our outdoor patios. Weather permitting.
Melissa Z., Business Owner

Q:
Is it good for kids?
A:
Hi Evelyn, I found the casual atmosphere was very accommodating for all age levels. It is a bit tight so I would encourage they stay seated. You will want to get there!
Jerry C.

Item 1

Best Fine Dining Italian Restaurant Philadelphia
Panorama Restaurant & Wine Bar
Panorama brings the authentic flavors of Italy to the heart of the Old City, in the Penn’s View Hotel . The Italian restaurant in Philadelphia that epitomizes La Bella Vita. Panorama elevates classic Italian specialties to new heights with a carefully composed menu of varied contemporary cuisine, such as house made burrata, hand rolled pastas and passionately crafted veal, lamb, steak & seafood dishes.
Hours of Operation
Tuesday - Thursday: 5:00 PM - 9:00 PM
Friday: 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM
Saturday: 3:00 PM - 10:00 PM
Sunday: 3:00 PM - 8:00 PM
Happy Hour
Tuesday - Friday: 4:30 PM - 6:00 PM
Saturday 3:00 PM - 4:30 PM
First Come First Serve at the Bar only
We do not accept Reservations for Happy Hour
Travel Our World of Wine, One Glass At A Time
Philadelphia's Wine Club
Join the Panorama Wine Club for private access to world-class wines and premium tastings. Panorama is the Guinness World Record Holder for World's Largest Wine Keeper, offering over 150 wines by the glass, 30+ sommelier-selected wine flights, and 400+ reserve bottles.
2:00 PM - 5:00 PM in the Wine Bar | 3:00 PM Wine Class
Wine Club will take place exclusively on the Last Sunday of each Month (*subject to change)

Dinner Menu
Our dinner menu brings together comforting Italian classics with a modern flair. Begin with antipasti such as crispy eggplant, calamari fritti, or PEI mussels, then move into hearty pastas and entrées, from parmigiana three ways to rigatoni alla vodka,
braised short rib, and roasted market fish.
The second half of the menu leans into indulgent flavors and seasonal pairings, featuring whipped ricotta toast, arancini, and roasted pork belly alongside signature pastas like cacio e pepe, squid ink spaghetti, and lumache bolognese. Elevated mains, including pan-seared scallops and NY strip, highlight bold, seasonal ingredients. Sundays are reserved for our all-day simmered Sunday Gravy, the ultimate expression of Italian comfort.

moma mediterranean kitchen menu
MEZZE
Mediterranean Duo  13
homemade hummus & Muhammara, tahini, walnuts
Melintzana  10
grilled eggplant, cherry tomatoes, chickpeas, yogurt mint dressing
Tzatziki  7
labneh (thick yogurt), cucumber, garlic
Brussels Sprouts 9
roasted in honey mustard, pumpkin seeds
Olives & Feta 8
medley Kalamata olives, sun-dried tomatoes, roasted garlic, feta cheese
Cauliflower Bites  10
roasted cauliflower, caramelized almonds, roasted peppers mayo
APPETIZERS
Shrimp Saganaki  17
baked shrimps, saganaki cheese, tomato, oregano
Beets Salad  15
roasted beets, walnuts, goat cheese, mint yoghurt
Pulpo  19
chargrilled octopus, fingerling potatoes, kalamata olives, cappers, cherry tomatoes
Mussels Pepata  16
P.E.I mussels in white wine sauce, black crushed pepper, garlic
Albania Salad  13
tomatoes, cucumbers, medley olives, feta, onions, oregano
Burek  14
filo dough stuffed with sheep milk cheese, topped with fig jam, organic honey
ENTREES
Branzino  37
whole grilled Mediterranean sea bass served with greens, roasted potatoes
Paella  53/97  serving 2 or 4 ppl
saffron rice, calamari, mussels, shrimps, clams, sausage, bell peppers, peas, tomatoes
Chargrilled Seafood Mix   39
calamari, prawns, fish of the day
Lamb Chops  38
pistachio crusted lamb chops, served with lemon roasted potatoes & tzatziki
Chicken Za'atar  26     add pasta  3
marinated chicken breast, yoghurt, Za'atar over grilled vegetables
Pomegranate Braised Short-Rib  33
pomegranate red wine reduction sauce, caramelized onions, over Israeli couscous
Fish of the Day   MP
pick from our fish displayer
safron pilaf......7
grilled vegetables......9
Credit Cards are subject to 3.5% surcharge fee. Please avoid fees by paying cash. Parties for 6 or more people 20% gratuity added. Please notify your server for any food allergies. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase the risk of food borne illnesses.
A perfect fusion of Pan-Mediterranean cuisine.
Follow
Instagram

Tues-Thurs    5pm-9pm
Friday             5pm-10pm
Saturday        5pm-10pm
Sunday      Open for Private Parties
Monday       Closed

Catering
King of Prussia’s Authentic Brazilian Steakhouse Experience
Located at the center of King of Prussia’s bustling new Town Center, Fogo is just minutes from the King of Prussia Mall, Valley Forge lifestyle center, and historic Main Line. Upon entering, guests are welcomed by a panoramic view of the entire restaurant, featuring an open kitchen that showcases our elevated version of the centuries-old cooking technique of churrasco. An expansive patio extends the award-winning Fogo experience to the outdoors for al fresco dining. Fogo offers differentiated menus for all dayparts including lunch, dinner, weekend brunch and group dining, plus full-service catering and contactless takeout and delivery options.
Parking
Complimentary valet parking during dinner and self-parking directly behind the restaurant, along with limited street parking.
Bar Fogo Features
Join us to enjoy Bar Fogo Features with $5 Beers, $8 South American Wines and $10 Brazilian-Inspired Cocktails.”
To-Go and Catering
Bring the Fogo experience to you with delivery or pick up.

Whether celebrating a special birthday, hosting a large corporate meeting, or a complete buyout of the restaurant, Fogo is the ideal place for groups of all sizes. Stateside is a staple of the thriving East Passyunk Business district in South Philadelphia.

Davio’s King of Prussia is open for Sunday brunch, lunch and dinner!
The 10,000-square-foot Davio’s restaurant at King of Prussia Town Center joins locations in Boston and The Colony, Texas as one of the Davio’s Northern Italian Steakhouse restaurants by Chef/Restaurateur Steve DiFillippo.
Under the leadership of General Manager Michael Dombkoski, Davio’s King of Prussia serves an array of carefully sourced and seasonally inspired Italian cuisine featuring homemade pastas, fresh salads and prime steaks.

Beverage
As bright and boisterous as a joy ride in a Tijuana taxi, El Vez exudes fun at every conceivable turn.
The flashy, frenetic Latin decor, featuring high-backed velvet Hollywood booths and an eye-popping low-rider bike elevated above the dining room, creates the perfect conditions for memorable food and drink. Unexpected interpretations of Mexican classics join traditional cooking on the expansive menu, complemented by a bar that boasts one of the biggest tequila selections — and the best margaritas — in the city. Striking the ideal balance between a south-of-the-border celebration and a hot and flashy Las Vegas blowout, El Vez is the embodiment of Mex-Eclectic spirit.
Group Dining
FEATURES
• Available brunch, lunch and dinner.
• Seating is available in the Main Dining Room for groups up to 75 people.
• Food is served family-style.
• El Vez is available to be reserved exclusively for up to 250 people.
• Extensive tequila and margarita list.

top of page
HOME

MENU
LOCATIONS
ABOUT US
Blog

South Christopher Columbus Boulevard
Order Birria Tacos and Mexican Food Online in Philadelphia
You can order online! Browse our menu items and choose what you’d like to order from us.
Not Accepting Orders
Delivery fee -
Min. order -
Free delivery above
Pickup
Delivery
​
Change
Pickup Address:
Add your delivery address
La Catrachita
Enjoy authentic Mexican food with our menu filled with birria tacos, quesabirrias, burritos, nachos, street tortas, and more. La Catrachita offers flavor, speed, and abundance in every dish. Explore the best of Mexican cuisine in Philadelphia!
​
Schedule Pickup Time
BIRRIA
Birria is a Mexican Dish that Originated in the State of Jalisco there are as many different styles is Tijuana. Shredded Birria Meat, Melted Cheese and Consome.
STREET TACOS
Each order come with 3 tacos corn tortilla chopped onions and cilantro also radish cucumbers, caramelized onions, green and orange spicy sauce.
CALIFORNIA STYLE TACOS
Each order come with 3 tacos, Flour Tortilla, cheese, pico de Gallo, lettuce, sour cream and salsa verde.
BURRITOS
All burritos are made with rice, beans, lettuce, cheese, pico de Gallo, avocado and sour cream. Choice your meat.
MEXICAN JUMBO QUESADILLAS
Homemade 12" in Corn Tortilla, Oaxaca Cheese. ON THE SIDE: Radish, Cumbers, Limes, Caramelized Onions, Green, Orange and Tatemada Salsa
SPECIAL TACOS
Each order come with 3 tacos, CORN TORTILLA, Special Made with: Guacamole, Cactus, Grilled Jalapeño, Oaxaca Cheese, Caramelized Onions.
TEX MEX QUESADILLA
Made with a 12" Flour Tortilla, Mozzarella and Cheddar Cheese also Sour Cream, Salsa and Guacamole Dipping.
NACHOS
Tortilla Chips, pico de gallo, black beans, cheddar, mozzarella, lettuce, finish with sour cream. Choice your meat.
MEXICAN FRIES
Are made with mozzarella fresh slice, jalapeño caramelized, onions and salsa verde. Choose your meat.
TORTAS CALLEJERAS
All tortas come with beans, Chiles en Vinagre, Oaxaca Cheese, Guacamole and Slices Tomatoes.
SALADS

name: AMA
raw_text:
Amá Philadelphia - Amá
101 WEST OXFORD STREET PHILADELPHIA, PA 19122
info@amaphl.com
215-933-0707
Hours
About

Hours
About
Menu
Press
Large Parties
Contact
GIFT CARDS
Reservations
GET DIRECTIONS
HOURS
Sunday - Thursday 5:00PM - 10:00PM
Friday - Saturday 5:00PM - 11:00PM
RESY RESERVATIONS
ABOUT
Amá, from Mexico City-born chef Frankie Ramirez, and partners, is an elevated Mexican restaurant in Philadelphia’s Fishtown/Kensington neighborhood.
    Located at 101 West Oxford Street, Amá is open seven days a week for dinner and features a full bar program with craft
    cocktails and a heavy focus on tequila and mezcal. The menu is seasonal, featuring hand-pressed tortillas and 20-plus items inspired by the six main
    culinary regions of Mexico, which include the Yucatán Peninsula, the Pacific coast, northern Mexico,
    central Mexico, the Gulf of Mexico, and the Baja region. Most of the menu, which rotates seasonally,
    is cooked on live fire and intended to be shareable. Appetizers include a variety of tacos, tostadas, crudos, ceviches, and aguachile, and seasonal
    vegetarian options that will be prepared on a custom eight-foot-long charcoal and wood-fired grill
    from M&M BBQ Company in Texas, with Ramirez using both charcoal and wood to cook premium
    proteins and fresh vegetables. House-made desserts will contain nostalgic flavors that virtually transport guests to Mexico.
Owners
Roberto Medina, Crisalida Mata,
Frankie Ramirez, Veronica Ramirez
General Manager
Stacey Becerril
Beverage Director
Diego Langarica
MENU
Chips and Salsas
house guacamole, six variations of salsas, heirloom corn tostadas
Callo de Hacha Tiradito
scallop, chintextle, dashi, tomato consommé
Tuna Tostada
smashed avocado, salsa macha, cilantro macho
Shrimp Ceviche Tostada
pico de gallo, burnt árbol, ancho chamoy
AGUACHILE DEL DIA
Fried Huauzontle
tempura, morita aioli, salsa macha
Milpa Salad

For your convenience, we offer both take-out y delivery from all of our locations. Check out our take-out y delivery menus to enjoy loco pez en la casa. * Take-out and delivery may be limited during high volume periods.
ORDER NOW
PHILLY TAQUERIA & BAR
LOCO PEZ (OR ‘CRAZY FISH’ POORLY TRANSLATED) IS YOUR AVERAGE DEFUNCT CORNER DIVE BAR RETOOLED INTO A FRIENDLY NEIGHBORHOOD PUB ‘N TAQUERIA. INSPIRED FROM THE TACO TRUCKS OF LOS ANGELES, AND THE DECOR OF YOUR GRANDPARENT’S BASEMENT, LOCO PEZ MEETS ALL OF YOUR “I NEED TACOS AND BEER!” NEEDS.

About the Business
Business owner information
Jorge M.
Business Owner
We use old family recipes from michoacan, Mexico, along with the owner and Chef, Jorge Martinez creations. Jorge Martinez is passionate and puts all of his love in every dish that he creates. We are known for our Guacamole, Cream of Crab Soup, Chipotle Chicken and Puntas con Nopales. 
Buena Vista Bar is NOW OPEN! Come and enjoy the BEST Jalapeño and Mango Margaritas!
We invite you to come and enjoy our food and warm inviting atmosphere!

1. Farmhouse Eggs
$9
Two eggs prepared your way, served with crispy bacon, golden breakfast potatoes, and toasted country white bread.
2. Chef’s Omelette
$14
Craft your own omelette with a selection of garden-fresh vegetables, spinach, mushrooms, and feta. Choice of cheese included. Enhance with bacon or sausage (pork or turkey).
3. Signature Breakfast Plates
•Buttermilk Pancakes (2) – $15
Served with your choice of bacon or sausage, or finished with house-made blueberry or strawberry sauce.
•Classic French Toast (2) – $15
Thick-cut, dusted with powdered sugar. Served with bacon or sausage, or house-made blueberry or strawberry sauce.
•Belgian Waffle – $16
Golden and crisp, with your choice of bacon or sausage, or house-made blueberry or strawberry sauce.
4. Avocado Tartine
$12
Choose sliced or spread avocado on artisanal toast with arugula, cherry tomatoes, balsamic drizzle, and a sunny side up or fried egg. Add bacon or feta +$4.
5.  Wellness Breakfast Bowl
$12
Arugula, quinoa, black beans, pico de gallo, avocado (sliced or spread), and an over-easy egg. Add walnuts +$2.
6. Bodega Green Salad
$9
A fresh mix of arugula and spring greens, cherry tomatoes, red onions, walnuts, parmesan, and your choice of honey lemon vinaigrette or balsamic reduction.
7. Loaded Breakfast Potatoes
$10
Golden potatoes layered with melted cheese and crisp bacon.
8. Yogurt Parfait Bowl
$7
Creamy Greek yogurt with oats, topped with your choice of honey, strawberry, or blueberry sauce, and finished with walnuts or almonds.
9. Seasonal Fruit Plate
$7
A refreshing trio of strawberries, bananas, and blueberries.
10. Market Mussels
$18
Steamed mussels served in your choice of red sauce, white wine, or buttermilk broth with garlic and cilantro.
11. The Bodega Burger
$18
Hand-crafted ground sirloin topped with cheddar, jalapeños, signature bodega sauce, lettuce, and tomato. Add bacon +$4, avocado +$4.
12. Breakfast Burrito
$9
Fluffy eggs with potatoes, pico de gallo, and cheddar wrapped in a warm tortilla. Add chicken or steak +$3.
13. Garden Vegetarian Sandwich
$11
Sautéed mushrooms, peppers, tomato, onions, and broccoli on toasted bread.
14. Southern Fried Chicken Sandwich
$15
Crispy fried chicken on a toasted brioche bun – or elevate it, served atop a golden waffle.
15. Breakfast Tacos (3)
$14
Corn tortillas filled with scrambled eggs, cheddar cheese, and your choice of bacon or sausage.
16.  Breakfast Empanadas (2)
$14
Flaky pastry filled with scrambled eggs, cheddar cheese, and bacon or sausage. Add chicken or steak +$4.
17.  Huevos Rancheros
$14
Crispy tortillas layered with black beans, avocado, pico de gallo, cheddar cheese, sunny side eggs, cilantro, and a touch of aioli.
18. Veggie Flatbread
$9
Oven-baked with fresh vegetables. Add chicken or steak +$4.
19.  Bodega Breakfast Brioche
$9
Toasted brioche with bacon, fried egg, and melted cheddar.
20. Classic Bagel Sandwich
$9
Fluffy scrambled eggs, crisp bacon, American cheese, and signature bodega sauce on a warm bagel.

About the Business
We offer an extensive selection of 91 tequilas and 26 mezcals along with featured flights highlighting distinctive tequilas, mezcals and sotol. Our cocktail program includes 19 cocktails with a selection of margaritas including the signature Central Margarita, a traditional Michelada, along with an assortment of wines and local craft and Mexican beers. The cuisine is casual Mexican; offering fresh house-made salsas, hot sauce and guacamole along with traditional and modern takes on tacos, burritos, salads and desserts made from scratch in a fun and vibrant atmosphere.

Our corn tortillas are thoughtfully crafted, organic, and handmade to deliver a truly authentic experience.

Seafood Tacos

DESSERTS
Experience Pure Indulgence with Our Premium Desserts!
Churros with Chocolate Dipping Sauce
$13
Crispy, handcrafted churros with luxurious homemade chocolate sauce.
Classic Tres Leches Cake
$13
A perfect blend of three milks soaks this delicate, homemade sponge cake.
Velvety Flan
$13

Decadent Chocolate Mousse Cake
$13
Rich chocolate mousse layered with a silky chocolate ganache.
Artisan Dessert Board
$20
A selection of our finest churros, tres leches, and flan, perfect for sampling.
Creamy Ice Cream (House Flavors)
$11
House-made with natural ingredients for the ultimate creamy treat.
Espresso Martini
$15
A sophisticated blend of vodka, espresso, and coffee liqueur. Perfect as a decadent after-dinner indulgence.
Signature Carajillo
$14
Our house specialty, this invigorating cocktail combines cold-brewed espresso with Licor 43, served over ice. Celebrating the vibrant spirit of Mexico, each sip marries the rich history of Mexican coffee with the sweet, complex flavors of a traditional liqueur. Perfect for savoring the essence of Mexico’s rich culinary culture.
Our menu features succulent, high-quality beef (Prime), Free Range Chicken, and flavorful wild caught Seafood, (Not Farm Raised), carefully selected to elevate your culinary experience. To complement these delectable proteins, our expert chefs craft each corn tortilla by hand, using traditional techniques. From the moment you take your first bite, you’ll savor the exceptional flavors that only top-notch ingredients and artisanal craftsmanship can provide, we aim to be great.
A gratuity of 20% will be added to parties of Five or more.

Ask the Community

Q:
We received an ad that says "Dine in and enjoy free margaritas with your meal." Do they serve you one per meal or are they endless? Are these with alcohol or do we bring our own tequila?  Same question about the pitcher, I assume it's byo tequilla?
A:
Hey there! Thanks for inquiring about our restaurant! We offer 1  complimentary Margarita to go with your Entree (Please remember to ask your server for one!) We are also BYOB and have Margarita Mix- regular.  Thank you and hope to see you soon!
Jorge M., Business Owner

We cater to various dietary restrictions and offer vegetarian and vegan options on any trading day, please contact us at least 24 hours prior to your booking and we will do our best to accommodate your request.
Our Producers
We believe that no dish can be better than its ingredients and that the best ingredients are usually local.
Every day we make many decisions about what we eat and every one of our food choices has an ethical and environmental impact.
It is the best of coincidences that good food choices – those that are good for our land and people, for the environment, for the body and mind – are also delicious and enjoyable.
Our Food Philosophy
We believe that no dish can be better than its ingredients and that the best ingredients are usually local. As great cooking starts with great ingredients, great ingredients start with great farmers.
Learn More
Make an online Reservation
or call +44 (0) 207 235 1200
About Tierra Colombiana
For over 30 years, Tierra Colombiana has been a beloved fixture in North Philadelphia, serving up authentic Latin American and Caribbean flavors. Our restaurant is a vibrant hub where diverse cultures converge, offering a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Discover the rich heritage of Colombian cuisine and experience the passion that goes into every dish.
Our Hours
Sun – Thurs 
8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Fri – Sat 
8 a.m. – 11 p.m.

WE CATER TO BIG OR SMALL CROWDS
Call us today and tell us about your special event, gathering or family reunion. We will take care of all the cooking while you entertain your guests and enjoy your reunion without the worry of a big elaborate meal.
Cancun Mexican Restaurant is at your service and will work with your budget to recommend a menu that best adapts to your party size and likes. Tell us what you celebrate, where and when and we will bring the food, you provide the guests.
CELEBRATE YOUR NEXT SPECIAL EVENT AL CANCUN MEXICAN RESTAURANT
We will create a fun and festive atmosphere for you and all of your guests. Call for details!

Menu
Appetizers
QUESO FUNDIDO
$15.00
Poblano peppers, chorizo, Chihuahua cheese served with flour tortillas. Vegetable option available.
NACHOS DON GOYO
$15.00
Crispy tortilla, melted Chihuahua cheese, beans and chorizo
sauce,
diced avocado, crema, queso fresco, red
onions,
and jalapenos escabeche.
TAMAL
(GF)    $5.00
Fresh homemade tamal, corn masa (dough), wrapped in a corn husk filled with sauce and meat.
EMPANADAS
$15.00
3 Empanadas with filling of the day, topped with fresh cheese, sour cream, pico de gallo.
FLAUTAS
$14.00
Crispy tacos, filled with chicken, lettuce, crema, queso fresco, Pico de gallo.
GUACAMOLE
$14.00
The traditional way.
CEVICHE DE CAMARON
$16.00
Sliced RAW Jumbo shrimp,  red onions, jalapenos, tomatoes, cilantro, avocado, lime juice, citrus, EVOO.
LA CITA SAMPLER
$25.00
Empanada, queso fundido, flautas, nachos don goyo, tamal, guacamole, pico de gallo.
TORTILLA SOUP
$6.00
Tomato & Pasilla broth, crema, queso fresco, crispy tortilla, avocado.
ENSALADA DE LA CASA
$9.00
Mixed greens, radish, carrots, avocado, queso fresco, tomatillo vinaigrette.

Tacos
Add lettuce, crema fresca, cheese and tomato for 50¢ each.

(GF) $14.00
Slow cooked pork, cilantro, raw onions.

(GF) $14.00
Achiote marinated pork, pineapple, cilantro, raw onions.
TACOS DE ASADA
(GF) $14.00
Steak tacos, cilantro, raw onions.

(GF) $16.00
(Beef tongue) Cilantro, raw onions.
TACOS DE PESCADO or CAMARON
(GF) $16.00
Pan Fried or Grilled Mahi-mahi, cabbage curtido, chipotle aioli, crema fresca, avocado cilantro.
TACOS DE VEGETALES
(GF) $14.00
Mixed vegetables, cilantro, raw onions.
TACOS DE BIRRIA
(GF) $16.00
Beef brisket and short ribs guajillo and chipotle base stew. the beef is tender slightly spicy, with Chihuahua cheese, raw
onions,
and cilantro, with consommé stew for dipping.

.75 per taco

from the taco menu.

Served over hot Comal pan dish. Onions, peppers, zucchini, squash, chile cascabel chimichurri.

CARNE ASADA
(GF) $28.00
Skirt Steak, mushrooms, cebollita, jalapeño, nopal, queso asado, guacamole, pico de gallo chimichurri.

Barbacoa (lamb), carne enchilada (spiced pork), Cecina (salted
beef), chorizo, cactus, guacamole, pico de gallo.
POLLO EN MOLE POBLANO
$23.00
Mole poblano contains nuts.

Chicken breast, covered with beans, Chihuahua cheese over a bed of vegetables and salsa verde.
COCHINITA PIBIL
(GF) $26.00
Yucatan style achiote marinated pork, slow baked in banana leaves, served with plantains, red onions habanero curtido.
CAMARONES A LA DIABLA

Jumbo shrimp and mussels in our red spicy sauce, mild upon request.
HUACHINANGO A LA VERACRUZANA
(GF) $28.00
Red snapper fillet, onions, tomatoes, capers, olives and chiles gueros (Banana peppers Not spicy).
Antojitos (street cravings)

Oaxaca cheese stuffed poblano pepper, egg batter, tomato sauce.

Corn tortillas filled with your choice of chicken, beef, cheese. Verdes, Rojas or Mole poblano
,
topped with crema fresca, queso fresco.

Welcome to Oasis
If you’ve got a hankering for fresh, high quality Mexican food in a relaxed, cozy spot, check out Oasis Mexican Grill in Collingswood, New Jersey. Serving an assortment of Mexican classics like burritos, fajitas, enchiladas and tacos, there’s something for every appetite. With fresh ingredients and hearty portions, Oasis Mexican Grill will satisfy your hunger. So, whether you’re dining in or taking out, Oasis Mexican Grill is a good bet for quality and flavor.
498 Haddon Ave Collingswood, NJ 08108
Call us: (856) 858-1807

Pancheros Menu
Fresh-pressed tortillas. The finest ingredients. Perfectly mixed bites.
We put in the extra work to make sure every ingredient is the freshest and most flavorful it can be. So you’re always guaranteed mouthfuls of flavor, bite after delicious bite.
burrito
A massive, fresh-pressed flour tortilla filled with your choice of marinated and grilled meats or Tofurizo, whole pinto or black beans, rice, cheese, and homemade salsas.
learn more
bowl
Everything you love about our burritos, minus the tortilla. Marinated and grilled meats or Tofurizo, whole pinto or black beans, rice, cheese, and homemade salsas.
learn more
tacos
Two fresh-pressed soft flour tortillas stuffed with your choice of marinated and grilled meats or Tofurizo, lettuce, cheese, and homemade salsas.
learn more
quesadilla
A cheesy, fresh-grilled flour tortilla stuffed with your choice of marinated and grilled meats or Tofurizo. Plus your choice of our homemade salsas!
learn more
Salad
A bed of fresh lettuce topped with your choice of marinated and grilled meats or Tofurizo, pinto or black beans, cheese, choice of homemade salsa, and our Cilantro Lime Dressing.
learn more
chips & more
Our blue corn chips are salty, crunchy, and made for scooping up our creamy, melty, gooey homemade queso, flavorful salsas, and fresh-made guacamole.
learn more
Kids Menu
Kidsadilla
Single Taco
Side of Rice
Kids menu available in-restaurant only.
Premium Ingredients.
Endless Choice.
Your choice to add toppings to any meal, like sautéed veggies, sour cream, jalapeños, and more. If gluten isn’t in your diet, skip our tortillas. If you’re highly sensitive to gluten, we’ll gladly change our gloves for you. You should be aware that some items containing corn, including our blue corn tortilla chips and corn salsa, may have a small amount of gluten from potentially co-mingling with gluten-containing grains in crop fields.

Food Allergies: Please note that all of our dishes are prepared to order and our normal kitchen operations may involve shared cooking and preparation areas.
We cannot, therefore, guarantee that any menu item will be completely free of allergens. Please inform our team of any allergies you may have.
A 20% Gratuity will be added to all split checks!

Menu | Nabrasa Brazilian Steakhouse | All-You-Can-Eat

Our Menu
Our rodizio style dinner menu features up to 15 different cuts of meat and fish. All of our meats are carved tableside directly to your plate. Our first course also features a salad bar with over 30 items including pre-made salads, paella, and traditional Brazilian rice and beans and much more.
join our loyalty
Reservation
Pricing
Dinner
Full Rodizio & Salad Bar
Monday-Sunday $64.95
Children Ages 7-12 $27.95
Children Ages 3-6 $10
Children Ages 2 + Under Complimentary
Salad Bar and Salmon Option $44.95
Price includes continuous tableside service of signature cuts of meat and fish, farm fresh sides,
and complimentary Brazilian Side dishes.
Drinks and Gratuity not included.
Prices are subject to change during holidays.
Sunday Brunch $48.95
Seniors (65+) Brunch Only $42.95
Children Ages 7-12 half off
Children Ages 3-6 $10
Children Ages 2 + Under Complimentary
Price includes continuous tableside service of signature cuts of meat and fish, farm fresh sides, waffle station, baked goods, Belgian waffles and pancakes, and our custom omelets. Now includes all you can eat snow crab legs.
Drinks and gratuity not included.
Prices are subject to change during holidays.
Dine In
Experience
Step I
Once you’ve been seated, enjoy our handcrafted specialty drinks while your server explains our dining experience to you and your guests
Step II
Visit our first-course gourmet salad bar compiled of freshly prepared salads, vegetables, imported cheeses, cured meats, Brazilian specialty dishes and the tableside Salmon service
Step III
Flip the card placed to the green side up to signal for our Gaucho Chefs to begin tableside service
Step IV
Our Gaucho Chefs will present 15 cuts of the finest meats, carved and
cooked
to your liking.
Step V
When you are satisfied, flip the card to the orange side until you are ready for more offerings
Step VI
If you wish to finish your meal, be sure to save room for one of Na’Brasa’s homemade desserts, coffees, or delicious cordials.

Who We Are
About Us
Curry leaf offer authentic dishes that are sure to appeal to your senses. Indian cuisine enjoys a great reputation among all ethnic foods in the world. It has an uncanny charm and those who try it find it rich in taste and flavor. A common ingredient in the Indian food is a wide range of spices.

Tiffin Indian Cuisine Philadelphia Testimonials
Read What Our Customers Have To Say About Eating At Tiffin:
sojoam23
★★★★★
January 2019
The food here is delicious and the staff was very pleasant. There was not one thing that we ordered that we were unsatisfied with. Wasn't over priced either. Will definitely be back.
Ms. Roz S
★★★★★
January 2019
The food was so GOOD  , and the people was so nice.  I will return
Kysha Woods
★★★★★
January 2019
Love the curry shrimp! And the garlic Nan is my absolute favorite.
Aria Srinivasan
★★★★★
January 2016
My friend and I got the livingsocial deal which was 3 courses including specialty naan for two people for $40. Given that most buffet places are $10-15, I thought paying the extra for a sit down place with 3 courses would be nice.
Appetizers: Aloo Chaat and Coconut Cauliflower. Aloo Chaat was your traditional chaat (tortilla like chip strips, garbanzo beans, and some sauces) which I enjoyed as an appetizer. Coconut cauliflower was drenched in coconut chutney AND coconut oil. The oil made me sick in a way and the overpowering coconut taste I didn't care for. Even when I took it home and tried to mix it with rice I couldn't finish it.
Entree-My friend ordered the lamb and I ordered the paneer something. My item was not oily and spicy! Just the way I like my Indian food! Next time I would go with someone vegetarian so I can try two curries, I generally like eating more than 1 with my food. Heard the lamb was delicious.
Naan-Garlic and Chili Naans were made tandoori style aka in an oven sans butter. This is good in the sense that the naan wasn't drenched in butter but it is definitely different. Crispy and not as soft. I guess I prefer mine on the stove softer.. The garlic got burned the way they cooked it.
Dessert-Rasmali Tiramusi. YUM!
Definitely would order here again for takeout/delivery. That seems to be their main revenue source as no one was in the restaurant. If you see this livingsocial deal, I would def snag it. Each entrÃ©e item is $12-15 so $20 for the whole thing is a steal.
For Indian food in the city, I like it!
Nigel Hselbaink
★★★★★
January 2019
Indian brunch for the win!
We got here on a Saturday morning around 11:30, and were seated immediately. We were there about 45 minutes before the place was full. I say that to say, either come early or make reservations. The place is BEAUTIFUL, and family friendly. We saw couples, families, and young folks all hanging out together.
Once you get here and seated, the service is attentive and kind. Our server, Josh, was good about answering questions, and providing suggestions, which made choosing from the expansive menu much easier. We had lovely rose mimosas, and I had the vindaloo egg skillet. The grilled challah is really delicious! My bestie got the poutine, which is billed as an appetizer, but you can totally eat it as a meal with the cheese, meat, and potatoes.
The pricing here is a taaad high, but between the setting, service, and scrumptious food, treat yourself and give it a shot!
Danielle Kinslow
★★★★★
November 2018
Good Indian food, decent prices and quick delivery! I'll be ordering again! Their chicken korma dish is great!
-->

About the Business
In the heart of South Jersey, Haldi stands as a culinary ambassador of India, introducing an exciting taste to our guests. Whether you're a seasoned fan of Indian cuisine or a newbie eager to explore, our menu is put together to transport you to the mesmerizing kitchens of the subcontinent. We are here to share the untold culinary story of India, embracing its diverse regional flavors and time-honored cooking techniques. With every dish, Haldi offers a delightful fusion of spices, aromas, and textures that leave a memory.

Founded by two passionate foodies, Haldi’s journey began with a shared love for the rich flavors that Indian cuisine has to offer. Drawing inspiration from our own culinary adventures and a deep appreciation for authentic recipes, we aspire to build more than just a restaurant; we're building a community of fellow food enthusiasts.

Spice up your life with a taste of India at Haldi! Let's celebrate the magic of Indian cooking, one delicious story at a time. Prepare to embark on a tastebud adventure and listen to the stories whispered from ancient kitchens. Come hungry, come curious, and come ready to fall in love with the heart and soul of Indian food.

Welcome to Haldi!

Our promise to you
30-day money back guarantee
HugeDomains provides a 100% satisfaction guarantee on every domain name that we sell through our website. If you buy a domain and are unhappy with it, we will accept the return within 30 days and issue a full refund – no questions asked.
Quick delivery of the domain
In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
Safe and secure shopping
Your online safety and security is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information.
We protect your information through SSL encryption technology, providing the safest, most secure shopping experience possible. Additionally, you may checkout with PayPal or Escrow.com.
FAQs
See more FAQs
How do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy?
Yes, you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process, it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain.
Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred.
For transfer instructions to GoDaddy, please
click here
.
How do I get the domain after the purchase?
Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar, NameBright.com, we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
What comes with the domain name?
Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee, however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.
Do you offer payment plans?
Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months.
See details
.
How do I keep my personal information private?
If you wish the domain ownership information to be private, add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public.
To add privacy protection to your domain, do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year, and then for a small fee for subsequent years.
Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update, and different registrars are faster than others. Usually your Whois information will be fully updated within two days.

Perfect Balance Bowl
Perfect Balance Bowl
We almost called it “The most epically flavor-packed, mom-approved, deliciously guilt free bowl in the world” but a Debbie Downer in legal nixed that idea. Someone on the interwebs called it a mini buffet in a bowl. We call it the Perfect Balance Bowl. Our Perfect Balance Bowl is prepared with our roasted veggies, plus your choice of premium sourced protein, served on a bed of rice or greens and topped with one of our delicious chef-driven masalas or daals.

Add your protein to a signature bowl.
Chicken
GF
Chicken
Our premium sourced tandoori chicken is cooked to perfection in our 600 degree tandoor ovens allowing the fat to drop away and seal in the yum, because we believe chicken should taste like chicken, well chicken.
X
Lamb
GF
Lamb
Our meatballs are made with Halal lamb with absolutely no fillers. We use our custom Indian spice blends and herbs in every hand rolled meatball, delivering just a hint of heat.
X
Salmon
GF
Salmon
Our salmon comes from the pristine waters of the Faroe Islands. Each salmon is fed a natural diet rich in sustainable marine resources and is Non GMO, uses no antibiotics, and is Global GAP & ASC certified. The North Atlantic is noted for its clear waters and steady temperatures, making it one of the finest fisheries in the world.
X
Paneer
V, GF
Paneer
Choolaah’s fresh-curd paneer cheese is inspired by co-CEO Randhir’s grandmother’s own family recipe. Made from wholesome milk, our vegetarian loving
paneer is a fresh cheese masterpiece. Choolaah believes in using our resources to support family farms. Randhir’s grandmother would approve.
X
Veggie Croquette
VE
Veggie Croquette
Our vegan croquettes are magical spheres of tasty goodness. Made with lentils, onions, eggplant, potatoes and green peas then flash fried into crispy ridiculously good rounds. Have a ball eating your veggies!
X
Tofu
VE, GF
Tofu
Our protein-packed, vegan tofu is crafted by Soy Boy in Rochester, NY. It is USDA Organic, Non GMO, Vegan, Kosher and 100% Delicious.
X
Roasted Veggies
VE, GF
Roasted Veggies
Our veggies are gently roasted to bring out the tasty goodness of each veggie. Our veggie medley of sweet potatoes, zucchini and cauliflower is vegan marinated. It'll will make you say ”That’s vegamazing!”.
X

Chicken Wrap

Lamb Wrap
Our naan wrap is filled with our halal-friendly lamb, finished with red onions and then drizzled with our sauces.

V

VE

Our signature creamy tomato and onion sauce with exotic herbs and spices is vegetarian friendly and delicious.
Chickpea Masala
VE, GF
We slow cook our chickpeas with exotic spices, for a vegan treat, just like grandma makes.
Black Lentil Daal
V, GF
Rich creamy black lentils slow cooked with tomatoes and spices for a deep rich, and
flavorful vegetarian daal.
Yellow Lentil Daal
VE, GF
Three lentils come together with vegetables, herbs and spices for vegan filled delight
Basmati Rice
VE, GF
Our imported basmati rice is lightly infused with a touch of cumin both white and brown are vegan and gluten-free.
Naan Bread
V
Our flaky, soft and crispy, hand-tossed naan is tandoor cooked to perfection in our 600 degree ovens.
Wheat Naan
VE
Flaky, soft and crispy, hand-tossed wheat naan.
Half Rice/Half Masala
V/VE, GF
Combination of your choice of Brown or White Basmati rice with any of our masalas and daals.
Side Salad
VE, GF
Spring mix and romaine with sweet potatoes, chickpeas and choice of housemade dressing.
Sauces
Tamarind Ginger
VE, GF
A sweet & tangy vinaigrette with a hint of ginger.
Spicy Mango
VE, GF
A sweet and spicy Alphonso mango chutney.
Mint Yogurt
V, GF
Our chutney is made with fresh mint which gives this yogurt sauce a refreshing kick.
Tamarind Apple
VE, GF
Our chutney is made with the sweetness of apple with the tang of tamarind.
Choolaah Ranch
V, GF
An Indian twist on the great American classic dressing. Saddle up!
Whoa Hot Sauce
VE, GF
It's a gluten-friendly combo of tart and sweet that will put a smile on anyone's face. Heat Level: 5/10
Ouch Hot Sauce
VE, GF
This sauce is a delicious blend of green chilies, serrano and scorpion pepper that delivers a fresh, citrusy punch. Heat Level: 8/10
OMG Hot Sauce
VE, GF
This sauce is hot. Like slap-my-face hot. Like, serrano, scorpion and habanero pepper hot. Heat Level: 10/10
Little Meals
We only use premium ingredients in our Little Meals.
Cheesy Naan Pizza
V
Delicious melty mozzarella cheese and our rich red sauce baked on a fresh naan.
Chicken Naan Pizza
It's so good your parents will probably try to sneak a piece. So watch out. Our crispy naan is topped with a flavor-packed red sauce, tandoor cooked chicken and mozzarella.
Little Choolaah Bowl
This little bowl of yum comes with your choice of chicken, paneer or tofu plus rice and masala of your choosing.
Masala Bowl
Comfort food at its simplest, the Masala & Rice bowl comes with a serving of white or brown basmati rice, plus a serving of masala or daal.
Chicken & Rice
GF
Juicy, tandoor cooked with delicious basmati rice.
Paneer & Rice
V, GF
Our vegetarian-friendly paneer cheese, toasted to perfection with basmati rice.
Tofu & Rice
VE, GF
Organic tandoor cooked tofu, with our fragrant basmati rice.
Beverages
Chilled Chai
V GF
Chill out with our traditional Chai. We combine the rich taste of black tea leaves with undertones of authentic spices and a hint of sweet goodness to make a cool anytime treat.
Hot Chai
V GF
Our traditional Hot Chai combines the rich taste of black tea leaves with undertones of authentic spices and a hint of sweet goodness.
Mango Lassi
V, GF
Classic yogurt based smoothie made from imported Alphonso mangoes.
Lemonade
VE, GF
Choose from fresh squeezed mint ginger or mango lemonade.
Dessert<
Kulfi Ice Cream
V, GF
Our Malai ice-cream is lightly infused with imported green cardamom.

About us
Head to Ajwa Halal Restaurant in Upper Darby, PA to enjoy authentic Indian cuisine at best prices. The secret behind of our taste is our dedication of our culinary chefs who prepare ultimate Indian dishes which gives you enormous taste. Here we bring out the Best Indian Food in Upper Darby, PA. Our incredibly delicious menu including an array of various delicious Indian dishes like tikka boneless, Pakistani style milkshakes, dal makhni which is complete treat for all the foodies.
