Kysha Woods
★★★★★
January 2019
Love the curry shrimp! And the garlic Nan is my absolute favorite.
Aria Srinivasan
★★★★★
January 2016
My friend and I got the livingsocial deal which was 3 courses including specialty naan for two people for $40. Given that most buffet places are $10-15, I thought paying the extra for a sit down place with 3 courses would be nice.
Appetizers: Aloo Chaat and Coconut Cauliflower. Aloo Chaat was your traditional chaat (tortilla like chip strips, garbanzo beans, and some sauces) which I enjoyed as an appetizer. Coconut cauliflower was drenched in coconut chutney AND coconut oil. The oil made me sick in a way and the overpowering coconut taste I didn't care for. Even when I took it home and tried to mix it with rice I couldn't finish it.
Entree-My friend ordered the lamb and I ordered the paneer something. My item was not oily and spicy! Just the way I like my Indian food! Next time I would go with someone vegetarian so I can try two curries, I generally like eating more than 1 with my food. Heard the lamb was delicious.
Naan-Garlic and Chili Naans were made tandoori style aka in an oven sans butter. This is good in the sense that the naan wasn't drenched in butter but it is definitely different. Crispy and not as soft. I guess I prefer mine on the stove softer.. The garlic got burned the way they cooked it.
Dessert-Rasmali Tiramusi. YUM!
Definitely would order here again for takeout/delivery. That seems to be their main revenue source as no one was in the restaurant. If you see this livingsocial deal, I would def snag it. Each entrÃ©e item is $12-15 so $20 for the whole thing is a steal.
For Indian food in the city, I like it!
Nigel Hselbaink
★★★★★
January 2019
Indian brunch for the win!
We got here on a Saturday morning around 11:30, and were seated immediately. We were there about 45 minutes before the place was full. I say that to say, either come early or make reservations. The place is BEAUTIFUL, and family friendly. We saw couples, families, and young folks all hanging out together.
Once you get here and seated, the service is attentive and kind. Our server, Josh, was good about answering questions, and providing suggestions, which made choosing from the expansive menu much easier. We had lovely rose mimosas, and I had the vindaloo egg skillet. The grilled challah is really delicious! My bestie got the poutine, which is billed as an appetizer, but you can totally eat it as a meal with the cheese, meat, and potatoes.
The pricing here is a taaad high, but between the setting, service, and scrumptious food, treat yourself and give it a shot!
Danielle Kinslow
★★★★★
November 2018
Good Indian food, decent prices and quick delivery! I'll be ordering again! Their chicken korma dish is great!
-->

Saffron Patch
Authentic Indian Restaurant
If you are looking for simply good Indian authentic food and a unique dining experience, here we are - The Saffron Patch. Serving authentic Indian cuisine for a long time, Saffron Patch savors great Indian foods and ambiance for our customers. Step into the Saffron Patch and the fragrant aromas of vegetarian & non-vegetarian delights. About us
we bring you the exquisite taste of Asia, perfected through years of experience, made using the freshest authentic ingredients. 

Balancing the perfect blend of spices with traditional and creative techniques, we offer you the very best in Indian cuisine.
Our highly skilled chefs will create for you the most mouth watering tastes with the best quality meats, poultry, seafood and vegetables infused with the finest ingredients and using fresh whole spices, stimulating the palate to the very last bite.

Glassboro New Jersey
Spicy Affair Indian Cuisine, Swedesboro NJ
Consider Our Offerings of Home-Cooked Elevated Cuisine
Spicy Affair Indian Cuisine features aromatic, authentic Indian food inspired by our home-cooked family recipes. We highlight the depth of flavors synonymous with Indian food with an understanding that you may prefer mild or spicier versions of your favorite dishes. We are here to help you understand the spices of India, how they can enhance and not overwhelm a dish. It is our pleasure to serve.
Our Story

ðDiscover the flavors of India in Philadelphia, PA.
At The Royal Indian Cuisine, we serve up delicious, authentic Indian dishes that make every meal special. Whether youâre stopping by for a casual bite, ordering in, or planning an event, weâve got you covered.
Learn More
ð®ð³
Delicious Indian Dishes.
Our menu is filled with mouthwatering Indian dishes, from spicy curries to fragrant biryanis and fresh naan. Each dish is made with fresh ingredients and traditional recipes to bring you the best of Indian cuisine.
Order Now
Catering for Any Occasion.
Let us handle the food! From small gatherings to large celebrations, we offer a variety of options to suit your needs. Just contact us to discuss your event, and weâll help create a menu that everyone will enjoy.
Order Now
Customer Reviews
Check out our most recent reviews!
Cheeto Whitman
Iâve ordered take out from here a couple times, and the food has always been good. The garlic naan and rice are on point, and the paneer dishes Iâve ordered have been very flavourful. Just wish there was a bit more paneer, but I know cheese is expensive right now.
azmi fatima
We visited for the lunch buffet and were thoroughly impressed. There was a wide variety of authentic Desi dishes, all cooked to perfection. The spice levels were just right throughout the entire meal, striking a perfect balance of flavor and heat.
Tracey Holland
I ordered online, Sunday, March 23rd. When I got to the restaurant about 9:15pm, they said that they didn't have my order. So, I called Beyond menu customer service and she said she would call the restaurant and call me right back. I believe the owner came out, and asked me if I had the right restaurant. So I left,
...
the man  I believed was the owner, came outside to get me, while the lady from customer service called me, to say that, they would make my food. When I got back inside, he told me to sit down, it would be a few minutes. It was 9:40 and they close at 10pm, but my food was smelling really good. So, when the man came out of the kitchen to hand me my food, he had this big smile on his face, like he knew that food was good and that I would be back. He was correct! It tasted just as good as it smelled. I ordered the chili chicken and chicken biryani and it was the best I have tasted. There is an Indian restaurant near my house, it's good, but it's not better than Royal indian cuisine. I will definitely be back!
Read More
Bessy Tam
Great flavors, lamb and chicken were both tender. Dessert wasn't too sweet but satisfied our cravings.

Overall a great experience, especially since they were the only restaurants opened late on Christmas Eve!

More food reviews on Instagram @midwestmunching
Ma R
We have visited this place during our trip for quick bite ! It was great down town near place but tough to get parking in a street ! Food perspective great food ! Well cooked ! Great taste ! They made food how we describe to them. Good place to visit and enjoy Indian food ! Lot of chicken ,Lamb and veg varieties but
...
less fish in the menu. Price is decent !  Might be get higher soon due to inflation!
Read More
Frequently Asked Questions
What type of food do you serve?
We specialize in
Seafood Specialties
with popular dishes like
Chicken Dhaniwal Korma
,
Baingan Bartha
,
Shrimp Vindaloo
.
What are your most popular dishes?
Our customers love our
Dal Makhani
,
Chicken Dhaniwal Korma
,
Baingan Bartha
,
Shrimp Vindaloo
.
Do you service
Center City West
?
Yes, we service
Center City West
,
Rittenhouse Square
,
Fitler Square
,
Graduate Hospital
and surrounding areas. The Royal Indian Cuisine is conveniently located to serve the entire region.
How do you prepare your food?
We prepare our dishes using traditional techniques including
Grilled
,
Baked
,
Fried
. Our
Dessert
specialties are carefully
Marinated
to ensure the best flavors.
Do you offer catering services?
Yes, we provide full catering services for events of all sizes. Our catering menu features our most popular dishes and can be customized to meet your specific needs. Contact us to discuss your event requirements.
What are your hours of operation?
We're open Tuesday through Sunday from 11:00 AM to 10:00 PM. We're closed on Mondays for kitchen prep and staff training. Holiday hours may vary - please call ahead to confirm.

Biryani Bowl of Lansdale
Welcome to Biryani Bowl of Lansdale. We're located in the heart of Lansdale to provide you with the best of Indian Cuisine. Join us for our Signature Lunch Buffet or Dine on Our Exquisite Menu. We offer Dining In, Take-Out and Catering. Do you want to enjoy the same cuisine from our restaurant at your private party or corporate event? Please feel free to give us a call and we can assist you with all your Catering / Party needs.

and deliveries
Call us 610.356.5252 - .5262
Menu
Classic Appetizers
Tulip Dumpling
Ground shrimp and crabmeat wrapped in a tulip shape and delicately steamed.
Sa-tay Chicken
Marinated in spices and coconut milk, grilled to perfection, and served on skewers with peanut sauce and cucumber salad.
Thai Dumpling
Fried dumpling filled with ground pork, water chestnut and black mushroom served with soy and sesame sauce.
Crispy Roll
Filled with ground chicken bean thread and vegetables then fried until crispy golden brown, and served with sweet and sour sauce.
Thai Treasure
Traditional goodies include Thai dumplings, chicken sa-tay, tulip dumplings, and crispy roll.
Samosa
Potato peas stuffed crisp turnovers served with mint chutney.
Papdi Chat
Crispy spinach crackers, potatoes and chickpeas topped with yogurt and tamarind chutney.
Tangi Eggplant
Thin slice of eggplant seasoned with lemon juice, chat Masala, tamarind chutney and crispy fried garnish with savory and cilantro.
Veggie Roll
Fried spring roll filled with mixed vegetables, cellophane noodles, served with our sweet and sour sauce.

Tiffin Indian Cuisine Philadelphia Testimonials
Read What Our Customers Have To Say About Eating At Tiffin:
sojoam23
★★★★★
January 2019
The food here is delicious and the staff was very pleasant. There was not one thing that we ordered that we were unsatisfied with. Wasn't over priced either. Will definitely be back.
Ms. Roz S
★★★★★
January 2019
The food was so GOOD  , and the people was so nice.  I will return
Kysha Woods
★★★★★
January 2019
Love the curry shrimp! And the garlic Nan is my absolute favorite.
Aria Srinivasan
★★★★★
January 2016
My friend and I got the livingsocial deal which was 3 courses including specialty naan for two people for $40. Given that most buffet places are $10-15, I thought paying the extra for a sit down place with 3 courses would be nice.
Appetizers: Aloo Chaat and Coconut Cauliflower. Aloo Chaat was your traditional chaat (tortilla like chip strips, garbanzo beans, and some sauces) which I enjoyed as an appetizer. Coconut cauliflower was drenched in coconut chutney AND coconut oil. The oil made me sick in a way and the overpowering coconut taste I didn't care for. Even when I took it home and tried to mix it with rice I couldn't finish it.
Entree-My friend ordered the lamb and I ordered the paneer something. My item was not oily and spicy! Just the way I like my Indian food! Next time I would go with someone vegetarian so I can try two curries, I generally like eating more than 1 with my food. Heard the lamb was delicious.
Naan-Garlic and Chili Naans were made tandoori style aka in an oven sans butter. This is good in the sense that the naan wasn't drenched in butter but it is definitely different. Crispy and not as soft. I guess I prefer mine on the stove softer.. The garlic got burned the way they cooked it.
Dessert-Rasmali Tiramusi. YUM!
Definitely would order here again for takeout/delivery. That seems to be their main revenue source as no one was in the restaurant. If you see this livingsocial deal, I would def snag it. Each entrÃ©e item is $12-15 so $20 for the whole thing is a steal.
For Indian food in the city, I like it!
Nigel Hselbaink
★★★★★
January 2019
Indian brunch for the win!
We got here on a Saturday morning around 11:30, and were seated immediately. We were there about 45 minutes before the place was full. I say that to say, either come early or make reservations. The place is BEAUTIFUL, and family friendly. We saw couples, families, and young folks all hanging out together.
Once you get here and seated, the service is attentive and kind. Our server, Josh, was good about answering questions, and providing suggestions, which made choosing from the expansive menu much easier. We had lovely rose mimosas, and I had the vindaloo egg skillet. The grilled challah is really delicious! My bestie got the poutine, which is billed as an appetizer, but you can totally eat it as a meal with the cheese, meat, and potatoes.
The pricing here is a taaad high, but between the setting, service, and scrumptious food, treat yourself and give it a shot!
Danielle Kinslow
★★★★★
November 2018
Good Indian food, decent prices and quick delivery! I'll be ordering again! Their chicken korma dish is great!

name: Saad's Halal Restaurant
raw_text:
Saad's Halal Restaurant
Toggle navigation
Saad's Halal Restaurant
About
Menu
Contact
Gallery
Saad's Halal Restaurant
All Halal / Only Halal / Always Halal
215 222 7223
Discover Story
the Restaurant
We started as a Halal Lunch truck in University City on 38th and Spruce. At the time, zabiha halal meat wasn't available in Philadelphia, so Saad took matters into his hands, and slaughtered cows and sheep himself and sometimes skinned them to get the job done.
Some restaurants are selective with their zabiha halal menu, but we take pride in providing an all zabiha halal menu to our customers, that's how we like to treat ourselves, and we treat our customers the same way.
We close for the Friday prayers because it's an obligation to attend the Jumaa' prayer; and it's an obligation to fast during the month of Ramadan, so we take a break and we close for a month for the sake of Allah.
We make everything from scratch, that's why everything we make is fresh and tastes so good.
Awards and Mentions
Here are some awards that we are honored to accept and Mentions that we are humbled to be part of.

About the Business
At our restaurant, every meal is a celebration of authentic  Indian flavors, freshly prepared every morning with fresh ingredients and no short cuts. you'll will never get bored of the  food . There will be special lunch platers ,wide variety of food  to choose from.
Whether you're stopping in for a quick bite, grabbing a wholesome meal to-go, or planning a corporate lunch, we've got you covered. With fast service, unbeatable value and warm hospitality, we make sure every guest feels like family.

Quienes somos - Bienaventuranza IPS
Avenida calle 53 # 71 a -13, Bogotá, Barrio Normandia
01-8000189689
INTRANET
Primary Menu
Inicio
Nosotros
Servicios
Familiares
Contáctanos
Trabaja con nosotros
¿QUIÉNES SOMOS?
Somos una institución hospitalaria dedicada a la atención individualizada y personalizada de las necesidades de salud físicas, emocionales y sociales de nuestros pacientes, mediante un grupo de trabajo entrenado en el manejo de equipos de monitoreo y ventilación mecánica, que permite mejorar la calidad de vida y el cumplimiento de los objetivos terapéuticos.
Tenemos todo lo que necesitas.
Talento humano
Contamos con un equipo multidisciplinario especializado en la atención de nuestros pacientes.
infraestructura
Instalaciones nuevas, modernas y seguras, ubicada en zona estratégica para ofrecer tranquilidad y bienestar a nuestros pacientes, familiares y aliados.
Tecnología
Tenemos una robusta red de datos, equipos de alta tecnología, software especializado en el manejo de la historia clínica y sistema de gestión integral de calidad, para garantizar procesos seguros y pertinentes durante la atención.
Misión
Prestamos servicios integrales en salud humanizados y con calidad, centrados en el cuidado de las personas a través de conocimiento científico y tecnología de vanguardia, buscando la satisfacción de usuarios y aliados; generando sostenibilidad financiera.
POLÍTICA DE CALIDAD
Nuestro compromiso será garantizar una atención integral humanizada, continua y respetuosa, mediante talento humano competente, infraestructura segura, tecnología de punta y uso eficiente de recursos que contribuyan a la defensa del medio ambiente y cumplimiento de altos estándares de calidad.
Visión
Seremos reconocidos a nivel nacional como una institución líder del sector salud por su excelencia, altos estándares de calidad, tecnología de vanguardia, cultura de servicio humanizado y seguro, comprometida con el cuidado del entorno social y ambiental.
POLÍTICA DE HUMANIZACIÓN
Para BIENAVENTURANZA IPS el bienestar de nuestros pacientes y sus familias es una prioridad Nuestro compromiso es brindar un trato digno humanizado y con enfoque diferencial, centrado en la seguridad y el cuidado del ser humano como persona.
NUESTROS
ALIADOS
NUESTRAS
INSTALACIONES
Las instalaciones son modernas, equipadas para ofrecer seguridad y una mayor comodidad a nuestros pacientes, familiares y aliados.
CONOCE MÁS
DE NOSOTROS

Enjoy classic favorites like butter chicken, biryani, and samosas to regional specialties that highlight the unique flavors of different Indian states. Our fast food selection includes mouthwatering burritos, and Tacos.

Our Services

Have questions? Weâre here to help!
Browse our frequently asked questions to learn more about our digital marketing services, process, and how
              we can help grow your business online.
What services does Inxcel Technologies offer for restaurant social media marketing?
At Inxcel Technologies, we provide restaurant-specific social media marketing services such as
                    content development, social media advertising, influencer marketing, and account management on
                    Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and other relevant platforms aimed at brand establishment, and
                    increasing foot traffic and online orders.
What is included in a restaurant social media marketing plan by Inxcel Technologies?
Our restaurant social media marketing comprehensive plan includes content calendars, platform
                    tailored strategies, advertisement strategies, influencer marketing, geo-targeting, and
                    comprehensive analytics on the campaignâs performance tailored to your restaurantâs objectives and
                    audience.
How does Inxcel Technologies approach restaurant SEO services?
We offer comprehensive SEO for restaurants that includes local SEO, citation and Google Business
                    Profile management, relevant content creation, mobile responsive design, and relevant link-building
                    to help restaurants rank higher on Google and Bing.
What are Inxcel Technologiesâs top online marketing strategies for restaurants?
Our team at Inxcel Technologies employs online marketing strategies such as local SEO, social media
                    marketing, Google Ads, email campaigns, collaboration with influencers, and managing online reviews
                    to drive new and returning customers to your restaurant.
Does Inxcel Technologies create a social media marketing for restaurants custom social media
                  marketing proposal for restaurants?
Yes, we create a social media marketing proposal for restaurants which includes a competitive
                    assessment for your current digital footprint, a competitor assessment, and defined objectives and
                    creative plans with advertising spend and projected return on investment.
Does Inxcel Technologies assist with social media campaigns for restaurants and help generate ideas
                  for them?
Yes, we do. We develop custom restaurant social media campaigns from food holidays and chef
                    highlights to audience participation, contests, and Instagram Reels to keep your audience actively
                    wanting your next meal.
What is the most effective digital restaurant marketing in 2025?
In my view as a digital marketing strategist for restaurants with Inxcel Technologies, the most
                    effective in 2025 will be combination strategies incorporating SEO, social media marketing, web
                    design, online ordering systems, and digital advertising.

About the Business
Bishos is a family-owned restaurant where cooking is done with love & passion. Focusing on authenticity & quality to satisfy your taste buds & fill your belly.
Bishos Middle Eastern Restaurant offers a great variety of Freshly made dips, savory pastries, stone fire flatbreads, salads, char-grilled kababs meals, shawarma platters, desserts, slushies and smoothies!
We always have gluten free, vegan, and vegetarian options.
Stop in and make Bisho's a part of your daily routine or place a catering order for all of your special events.

Back to Top
About Us
Chengdu Famous Food
is a contemporary Sichuan restaurant located in University City, established in 2017. Our chefs craft dishes that evoke the flavors of their cherished memories, sharing the rich culture of Sichuan with the diverse community of University City. Each dish offers a unique experience, potentially introducing you to an entirely new culinary sensation.
Our executive chef Xue (pronounced "sue-yeah"), hails from Chengdu, the vibrant capital of Sichuan and the homeland of pandas. Chef Xue is a distinguished Level I chef, the highest certification for professional chefs in China, having honed his skills in Chengdu during the 1970s. Before relocating to the U.S., he served as the executive chef at a prestigious five-star hotel restaurant in Hong Kong. Chef Xue has played a pivotal role in establishing kitchens and training chefs at numerous restaurants in New York City, New Jersey, and Philadelphia.
Back to Top
Visit Us
Hours
Lunch:

Dinner:

Phone

Location
3635 Lancaster Ave
Philadelphia, PA 19104
Parking
Metered parking is available on Lancaster Avenue. It’s free after 8 pm and on Sundays. Most nearby residential streets offer free two-hour parking during the weekdays. Additionally, free parking is available on these streets after 6:30 pm on weekdays and all day on Saturdays and Sundays, including on 35th, 36th, Powelton Avenue, Race Street, and Warren Street. Please note that the Parking Permit Authority strictly enforces parking regulations, so be sure to read the signs carefully.

1 More Attribute
About the Business
Peking Roast Duck is one of the famous local dishes in Beijing. There are several ways to roast duck, but the roasting method of “Hanging Oven Roast Duck” is called Beijing roast duck. 

At that time, the “Hanging Oven Roast Duck” technology was passed down by the royal chef of the Qing Dynasty. One of the five the most famous roast duck chefs in Beijing, the fifth Father of Duck, who masters “Hanging Oven Roast Duck” barbecue technology, is an intangible cultural heritage of the fifth generation of successor. 

Beijing Duck Seafood Restaurant in Philadelphia, as the name suggests, is the authentic inheritance of the fifth Father of Duck. Here you can enjoy authentic “Hanging Oven Roast Duck”.
…

Pickup Menu

Back to Top
About Us
Chengdu Famous Food
is a contemporary Sichuan restaurant located in University City, established in 2017. Our chefs craft dishes that evoke the flavors of their cherished memories, sharing the rich culture of Sichuan with the diverse community of University City. Each dish offers a unique experience, potentially introducing you to an entirely new culinary sensation.
Our executive chef Xue (pronounced "sue-yeah"), hails from Chengdu, the vibrant capital of Sichuan and the homeland of pandas. Chef Xue is a distinguished Level I chef, the highest certification for professional chefs in China, having honed his skills in Chengdu during the 1970s. Before relocating to the U.S., he served as the executive chef at a prestigious five-star hotel restaurant in Hong Kong. Chef Xue has played a pivotal role in establishing kitchens and training chefs at numerous restaurants in New York City, New Jersey, and Philadelphia.
Back to Top
Visit Us
Hours
Lunch:
11am–2:15pm
Dinner:
4:30pm–9:15pm
Phone
(215) 386-1088
Location
3635 Lancaster Ave
Philadelphia, PA 19104
Parking
Metered parking is available on Lancaster Avenue. It’s free after 8 pm and on Sundays. Most nearby residential streets offer free two-hour parking during the weekdays. Additionally, free parking is available on these streets after 6:30 pm on weekdays and all day on Saturdays and Sundays, including on 35th, 36th, Powelton Avenue, Race Street, and Warren Street. Please note that the Parking Permit Authority strictly enforces parking regulations, so be sure to read the signs carefully.

About Chubby Cattle Shabu
The Chubby Cattle in Chinatown you know and love is only about to get better. We’re excited to bring you Chubby Cattle Shabu, Philly’s premier destination for all-you-can-eat Wagyu Shabu.
Enjoy our carefully transformed menu, featuring distinct all-you-can-eat tiers and a delightful selection for every palate. We’re eagerly looking forward to providing you with the best quality ingredients, from our very own domestic wagyu ranch to our partnership ranches in Australia and Japan.
Get ready for an unforgettable experience!

About the Business
Dim Sum literally means “touching the heart” in Chinese language. It is typically served in a small plate so it also means “snack” or “small sample”. This unique culinary treasure originated in China many hundreds of years ago and is a showcase of China’s rich culinary diversity and history . Although Dim Sum is popularly regarded as Cantonese cuisine, it actually originated in Northern China as an exclusive luxury for the royal family, and eventually it was served in tea houses, particularly the busy tea houses along the famous Silk Road, where merchants and local elites met and socialized.

Dim Sum can be enjoyed on any occasion, as appetizer, starter, lunch, snack, or even as a main course or dessert.

We at Dim Sum & Noodle serve well prepared Dim Sum for your enjoyment and excitement of this Chinese culinary treasure hunt and journey.

3. Payment Methods
For the online ordering, we accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and
									Discover credit card if the Vendor chooses online payment. In order to protect our customers from
									credit card fraud, the billing address on your order form must
									match the billing address to which your monthly credit card
									statement is mailed. All Cartana online transactions are

									the order. You are obligated to pay for the order you made using the Sites unless the Vendor cancels the order.
4. Credit Policy
Unless prohibited by law, in the event of any error in

5. Communications from Cartana
If you use our Sites and Services, Cartana may

6. Technical Requirements
Use of the Services requires Internet access through your

Privacy Policy
Privacy Policy
Updated and Effective Jan 6, 2019
We are concerned about privacy issues and want you to be
							familiar with how we collect, use and disclose Personal
							Information (as defined below). This Privacy Policy describes our
							practices in connection with privacy and the Personal Information
							that we collect through the web sites, www.cartana.net, cartana.co, all the web sites hosted by Cartana 
							for participating restaurants or businesses, the related
							Cartana mobile apps or devices, and selected other
							domains (collectively, the "Sites"). Except as indicated below,
							this Privacy Policy does not address the collection, use or
							disclosure of information by us or by third parties on any
							web sites other than the Sites. As used in this Agreement,
							"Cartana", "we," "us," and "our" shall mean Cartana LLC.
By accessing and/or using the Sites, you agree to all the
							terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree
							to all the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy, do not
							use the Sites. We may change this Privacy Policy from time to
							time and without prior notice, except that if we make a material
							change, we will notify you prior to the effective date of the
							change. Changes to this Privacy Policy will be effective as soon
							as they are posted, unless a later Effective Date is provided. By
							continuing to access and/or use the Sites after the Effective
							Date of a revised Privacy Policy, you agree to be bound by the
							revised Privacy Policy. For clarity, if you do not agree to the
							new terms of the Privacy Policy, do not continue using the Sites.
							The most current version of this policy will always be posted on
							the Sites.
1.What Types of Information Do We and Our Third Party
							Service Providers Collect From You?
Personal Information
is information such as your name,
							tied to a postal address, telephone number, email address, and
							date of birth, or other data that, when taken together, can
							uniquely identify you. Personal Information also includes certain
							sensitive information related to your finances or, for business
							accounts, related to the finances of your employer, such as a
							credit card number or other payment account number (including the
							three (3) or four (4) digit validation code for your credit
							card). In order for you to take advantage of the services
							provided through the Sites, we may require that you furnish
							Personal Information or, for business accounts, that your
							employer furnish Personal Information for you. We and our third
							party service providers collect your Personal Information when
							you voluntarily provide it to us or, for business accounts, when
							your employer provides it to us.
Non-Personal Information
(or
"Non-PII"
) is
							aggregated information, demographic information and any other
							information that does not uniquely identify you. We and our third
							party service providers may collect your Non-Personal
							Information, including information about the device you are using
							in accessing and/or using the Sites, information from referring
							web sites, and your interaction with the Sites. We and our third
							party service providers may also aggregate Personal Information
							in a manner such that the end-product does not uniquely identify
							you or any other user of the Sites, for example, by using
							Personal Information to calculate the percentage of our users who
							have a particular telephone area code. This collective
							information constitutes Non-Personal Information.
Cookies and Other Technology
A cookie is a small piece of
							data that is sent by the Sites to your Internet browser and stored
							on your computer's hard drive, and that delivers information
							about you and your activity on the Sites. Pixel tags and web
							beacons are small graphic files that can function in various ways
							(such as allowing us to track how you view an email that we send
							you, and track your activity on the Sites) and are commonly used
							in conjunction with cookies. We, our third party service
							providers and other third parties detailed below under "How Do We
							and Our Third Party Service Providers Use Information Collected
							From You?" may use cookies, pixel tags, web beacons, and other
							similar technologies to better serve you with more tailored
							information and to facilitate your ongoing use of the Sites. If
							you do not want information collected through the use of cookies,
							there is a simple procedure in most browsers that allows you to
							decline the use of cookies.
IP Addresses are the Internet Protocol addresses of the
								computers that you are using.
Your IP Address is automatically
							assigned to the computer that you are using by your Internet
							Service Provider (ISP) and is identified and logged automatically
							in our server log files whenever you visit the Sites, along with
							the time(s) of your visit(s) and the page(s) of the Sites that
							you visited. Collecting IP Addresses is standard practice on the
							Internet and is done automatically by many websites.
Location Information.
We may obtain information about your
							physical location, such as by use of GPS and other geolocation
							features in your device, or by inference from other information
							we collect. For example, your IP Address indicates the general
							geographic region from which you are connecting to the Internet.
2.How Do We and Our Third Party Service Providers Use
							Information Collected From You?
Personal Information.
We and our third party service
							providers may use your Personal Information and any third party's
							Personal Information that you may provide, as applicable:
to process your registration on our
								Sites, including verifying your information to ensure its
								accuracy and validity.
to fulfill your requests (e.g., to
								allow you to order food through our restaurant partners and have
								it delivered to you, or to provide you with information that you
								request).
to fulfill your purchases (e.g., to
								process credit card payments in connection with your food
								order).
to customize content on our Sites
								(e.g., the restaurants that will deliver to your location).
to send you important information
								regarding the Sites, such as certain changes to our terms,
								conditions, policies and/or other administrative information.
								Because this information may be material to your use of the
								Sites, you may not opt out of receiving such communications.
to inform you of products,
								programs, services and promotions that we believe may be of
								interest to you and to permit you to participate in sweepstakes,
								contests and similar promotions (collectively, "Promotions").
to permit you to refer us to your
								friends so that we may send them a promotional offer through the
								Sites. If you wish to use this feature, you may be required to
								provide us with, and we may use, your friend's name and email
								address. By using this functionality, you affirm that you are
								entitled to use and provide us with your friend's name and email
								address for this purpose. We will not use your friend's Personal
								Information for any purpose other than to allow a promotional
								offer to be sent and/or to troubleshoot any issues with respect
								such promotional offer, unless we disclose such other purpose to
								you at the time you provide your friend's Personal Information
								to us.
for our internal business purposes,
								such as data analysis, audits, developing new products,
								enhancing our website, improving our services, identifying usage
								trends and determining the effectiveness of our promotional
								campaigns.
for purposes disclosed at the time
								you provide your Personal Information or as otherwise set forth
								in this Privacy Policy.
Non-Personal Information.
Because your Non-Personal
							Information does not personally identify you, we and our third
							party service providers may use such information for any purpose.
							For example, we may work with third parties for the purpose of
							advertisement delivery on the Sites, including online behavioral
							advertising ("OBA") and multi-site advertising. The Non-Personal
							Information collected about your visits to the Sites may be used
							by third parties in order to provide advertisements about goods
							and services of interest to you. These third parties may also set
							cookies or web beacons to assist with advertisement delivery
							services.
In addition, we reserve the right to share your
							Non-Personal Information with our affiliates and with other third
							parties, for any purpose. In some instances, we and our third
							party service providers may combine Non-Personal Information with
							Personal Information. If we do combine any Non-Personal
							Information with Personal Information, the combined information
							will be treated by us as Personal Information hereunder (as long
							as it is so combined).
3.Other Important Notices Regarding Our Privacy Practices.
Forums and Profiles.
We and our third party service
							providers may make available through the Sites certain services
							(for example, message boards, reviews, chat functionality, "profile pages"
							and blogs) to which you may be able to post information and
							materials. Please note that any information you provide in
							connection with such services may become public, and may be
							available to visitors to the Sites and to the general public,
							including without limitation the ratings and reviews that
							accompany many restaurant listings and the comments section of
							our blog posts. We urge you to exercise discretion and caution
							when deciding to disclose your Personal Information, and/or any
							other information and/or materials, on the Sites. NEITHER WE, NOR
							ANY OF OUR THIRD PARTY SERVICE PROVIDERS, NOR ANY OTHER PERSON OR
							ENTITY DULY AUTHORIZED BY US AND/OR BY OUR THIRD PARTY SERVICE
							PROVIDERS, IS OR SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY USE BY ANY
							UNAUTHORIZED PERSON OR ENTITY OF ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION YOU
							DISCLOSE THROUGH THE SITES.
Third Party Sites.
Except as expressly set forth herein,
							this Privacy Policy does not address, and neither we nor our
							third party service providers are responsible for, the privacy,
							information or other practices of other websites and/or any third
							parties, including without limitation any of our affiliates
							and/or any third party operating any site to which the Sites
							contains a link. The inclusion of a link to a third party website
							on the Sites does not imply endorsement of the linked site by us
							or by our affiliates. Please note that your access and/or use of
							any third party websites, including by providing any information,
							materials and/or other content to such sites, is entirely at your
							own risk.
Security.
We and our third party service providers use
							reasonable organizational, technical and administrative measures
							to protect Personal Information under our control. However, no
							data transmission over the Internet or data storage system can be
							guaranteed to be 100% secure. Please do not send us credit card
							information and/or other sensitive information through email. If
							you have reason to believe that your interaction with us is not
							secure (for example, if you feel that the security of any account
							you might have with us has been compromised), you must
							immediately notify us of the problem by contacting us in
							accordance with the "Contacting Us" section below.
Unsubscribe.
If you do not wish to receive
							marketing-related emails or SMS text linked web pages from us, you may unsubscribe from
							receiving them by clicking on the "unsubscribe" link at the
							bottom of any of those emails or the web pages linked by URL within the SMS message.
Changing Personal Information.
You may review, correct
							and/or update certain elements of your Personal Information by
							adjusting your preferences in the "Setting->Update Your Profile" section of
							cartana.co. We and our third party service providers are not
							responsible for altering Personal Information from the databases
							and/or other records of third parties with whom we and our third
							party service providers have shared your Personal Information.
Retention Period.
We and our third party service providers
							will retain Personal Information for the period reasonably
							necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy
							Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted
							by law.
Note Regarding the Use of the Site by Children.
Under no
							circumstances are the Sites directed to and/or intended for use
							by individuals under the age of thirteen (13). Such individuals
							are prohibited from using the Sites and should not provide
							Personal Information through the Sites.
Disclaimer.
If you choose to access the Sites, you do so
							at your own risk, and are responsible for complying with all
							applicable laws, rules and regulations. We may limit the
							availability of the Sites, in whole or in part, to any person,
							geographic area and/or jurisdiction we choose, at any time and in
							our sole discretion. By using the Sites and submitting any
							Personal Information, you consent to the transfer of Personal
							Information to other countries, which may provide a different
							level of data security than your country of residence provides.
California Privacy Rights.
If you are a user of the Sites
							and a California resident, California's "Shine the Light" law
							(California Civil Code 1798.83) permits you to request and
							obtain from us once a year, free of charge, information regarding
							our disclosure of your Personal Information (if any) to third
							parties for direct marketing purposes. If this law applies to you
							and you would like to make such a request, please submit your
							request in writing to the address provided below.
Contacting Us.
If you have any questions regarding this
							Privacy Policy, please contact us by email by clicking "Contact" of the website www.cartana.net
						    or write to the following address:
Cartana LLC Attention: Privacy Team
							912 LOVELAND MADEIRA RD, LOVELAND, OH 45140

name: Nine Ting
raw_text:
Nine Ting: Hot Pot & BBQ Dining - Philadelphia
Skip to content
Chinatown Location
Order Online
KOREAN BBQ
Delicious Korean Flavors
Order Now
HOT POT
Grill and Sizzle at your Table!
Order Now
Previous
Next
About NineTing Restaurant
Nine Ting restaurants are an all-you-can-eat Hot Pot and BBQ dining experience  in Chinatown.
Our tables are equipped to handle both Hot Pot and BBQ, so customers can enjoy a delicious meal of either or both. Hot Pot starts with a pot of simmering broth at your own table. Order whatever you like and create your own favorite dish. Tabletop BBQ is a delicious meal that you can prepare for yourself at your very own table. The bold ambiance and exotic flavors will ensure a heightened dining experience that captures the essence of Far Eastern cuisine. This is a once in a lifetime experience that only those that come to a Nine Ting restaurant can enjoy.
HOT POT FOODS
火锅配料
Craft and brew your favorite foods right at your table!
HOT POT 火鍋
Start with a pot of simmering stock at your table. Order whatever you like and create your own favorite dish. Choose from a variety of thinly sliced meats, seafood, leafy vegetables, mushrooms and noodles. Then toss your ingredients into the soup base. The cooked food is usually eaten with a dipping sauce. Talk with your friends as you watch your food cook right in front of you. Enjoy the aromas and experience the joy of cooking and eating together!
HOT POT FOODS
火锅配料
Our menu is fully stocked with the freshest ingredients and premium proteins.
One price gets you an all-you-can-eat experience right at your table.
KOREAN BBQ
韓國燒烤
烧烤无限 任吃到饱
All You Can Eat BBQ
KOREAN BBQ
韓國燒烤
Tabletop BBQ is simply delicious food that you prepare yourself at your very own table. It's fun and easy. Grill your meat and vegetables to perfection. Spread out some lettuce leaves or wrap your cooked meat in the lettuce, toss on some sliced peppers, kimchi, add some rice, a dash of "Nine Ting Special Sauce", fold it over and there you have it - Heaven on the lips.
KOREAN BBQ
韓國燒烤
Special Events
九鼎轩特供
EVENT
餐馆活动
Special Offer for Your Birthday
A free meal at Nine Ting 生日免费餐厅
Get a little extra birthday love with one free meal! Come in on your birthday with a valid ID to redeem your free meal! You can enjoy a Hot Pot or BBQ, or a combination of the two for only $5 extra. It is a tradition at Nine Ting
*Offer only valid with a two party minimum, with one full price paying customer.
Chinatown
215-238-9996
926 Race Street
Philadelphia, PA 19107
Hours
Sun - Thurs: 12pm - 11pm
Fri - Sat: 12pm - 12am
View Location Details
ABOUT US BY ZAGAT
Some want Hot Pot and others crave Korean BBQ. Both are easy breezy at this sleek, modern Asian BYO spot in Chinatown, where the dual cook tops are set up at each table. Flat pricing keeps the all-you-can-eat meal manageable, plus private rooms can handle a celebration.
Subscribe to our Newsletter
About Us
Nine Ting restaurant is an all-you-can-eat Hot Pot and BBQ restaurant in Philadelphia. Our tables are equipped to handle both Hot Pot and BBQ, so customers can enjoy a delicious meal of either or both.
Philadelphia Chinatown
926 Race Street, 1st Floor
Philadelphia, PA 19107
215-238-9996

About the Business
"Chuan", are small pieces of meat roasted on skewers. As an iconic street snack in China, it originated in the Xinjiang region, and has been spread throughout the rest of the country. Chuan Kee specializes in BBQ skewers and Hotpot skewers with a wide variety of choices. Our goal is to provide the customers with the most authentic Chinese skewer experience.

About Us Amazing Chinese Restaurant
Dim Sum Factory proudly serves the traditional cuisine of Shanghai China. We’re known for Shanghai & Cantonese style dim sum such as our savory soup dumplings, fried buns, Shumai and scallion pancakes, but our entrees are also a fan favorite. We opened Dim Sum Factory with the intention of sharing the unmistakable flavors of Jiangzhe (East of China) and Shanghai across the globe while honoring the legacy of our ancient recipes.
In Fall 2020 we greatly expanded and renovated our restaurant in effort to provide a comfortable dining experience and allow for quick & contactless takeout and delivery. We invite you to join us in our dining room or bring our flavors home for a meal around the TV with friends. Either way, we believe you’ll fall in love with the flavors of Shanghai and the service of Dim Sum Factory.

Testimonial
–
Andrew Wong
I’ve visited China numerous times and this Shanghai-styled dim sum is as close as you get. Very authentic with each dim sum piece a jewel in itself.
–
Wendy Lai
We loved the seafood fried rice, chicken skewers, and the scallion pancakes. All and all we gave this 5 stars.
–
Danny Quick
With very low expectations we went there for our dinner. The restaurant is spacious, good lighting and ample seating.
–
Vic Chanthashivakul
The dim sum at this restaurant was delicious! If you like good quality dim sum, then you can look no further.

Q:
Can I bring alcohol?
A:
I believe they are BYOB. When I was there people had bottles of wine on their tables. 
Call before you go to verify. They may have been a party since they were all sitting at the long tables together
Arlene J.
See 2 more answers
Q:
Are there tables suitable for 6 people?
A:
Yes. This place is actually more ideal for groups than singles or a couple. The tables are like those long, banquet hall style tables. So it's very ideal for a group
Carlos C.

About the Business
Bao Nine is an Asian fusion restaurant in Philadelphia inspired by the irresistible Taipei street-style Gua Bao: tender, delicious bao buns. 
The experience
a soft and dreamy pillow.
The feeling
cloud nine.
So we went back to our roots—the city of brotherly love—and created
flavor combinations that would reflect and inspire our Philly neighbors from all around the world.
What to call this sense of happiness that takes you way beyond the usual
bao nine, of course.
Because we’re not just any bun. And that’s just how you like it.

Daily
menu
Feeling Hungry Now? Explore Our Menu for Online Chinese Food Order
When you are craving something warm, tasty, and full of flavor, nothing hits the spot quite like Chinese food. The good news? You do not have to wait long or travel far. With online Chinese food ordering, you can easily enjoy your favorite dishes from the comfort of your home.
At
Peter Chang KOP
, we make it simple to bring the restaurant experience to your table. Whether you are planning a quiet night in or sharing a meal with family and friends, you can easily order Chinese tapas online near you and enjoy small plates packed with flavor. In fact, our tapas are designed for sharing, so you get to taste a little bit of everything without missing out.
One of the local favorites we are proud of is our soup dumplings in King of Prussia. In fact, these delicate dumplings are filled with rich broth as well as tender meat. Besides, they are the kind of dish that warms you up and makes you feel right at home.
If you have been searching for
good Chinese food near you
, your search ends here. Our menu is filled with fresh, authentic options that bring together both traditional and modern flavors. From hand-pulled noodles to spicy entrees and chef’s specials, everything is made with care to give you that true taste of Chinese cooking.
And if you love variety, you will want to try our dim sum food near you. From dumplings and buns to rolls and small bites, dim sum is the perfect way to enjoy different flavors in one meal. It is tasty, enjoyable, and great for sharing!
So, the next time you are hungry and do not want to cook, remember that a full menu of authentic flavors is just a click away. Explore our menu, choose your favorites, and enjoy
Chinese Food Order Online
the easy way with Peter Chang.
Our Story
Peter Chang is an award winning chef specializing in Szechuan cuisine who has cooked for restaurants throughout cities in the American southeast and the DMV area.
Find Us

About the Business
We serve the University City, Philadelphia area with the best Korean dishes. Our restaurant offers bibimbap, various hot pots, barbecue meats, chicken dishes, and potstickers. served with rice and side dishes. A selection of K-pop music completes the atmosphere in our restaurant. 
We offer dine-ins and takeouts. We hope to see you soon.

Functional
These cookies allow the Controller’s web application to remember choices you make while browsing and/or using the application (such as your user name, language or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features.
These cookies can also be used to remember changes you have made to text size, language and other parts of web pages that you can customize.
The information these cookies collect will not personally identify you, and they cannot track your browsing activity on non Controller’s websites.
For reliable review of your order status, on-screen on the application, in real-time, and also for easy reordering, your data may be saved on your device, serving a cookie locally.

Order Online!
You can now order online!
Online ordering is a convenient and efficient way to get the taste of Thailand direct to your home. By using our online ordering you can browse our menu, customize your order and pay for the meal from the comfort of your own homes. You can order via our online ordering link or call the restaurant to place the order.
Call us or click order online

name: Bhan Thai - Mount Laurel
raw_text:
Bhan Thai – Best Thai food restaurant located in Mount Laurel and Marlton NJ. Within easy reach of Cherry Hill, Moorestown and Voorhees NJ. Healthy and fresh cooked food using natural ingredients and homemade spices and sauces.

Bhan Thai (Marlton)
1041 RT-73, Marlton, NJ 08053
Phone : (856) 422-8424
Order Online
Order Now
passion for excellence
Experience home-style Thai food, using only fresh, natural ingredients. Authentic fresh food in a really nice quaint environment. No GMO and many vegan and gluten-free options to crave for. Tina and Ava bring you culinary art from multi-generations of experience and passion for food.
Bring your own beer or wine for an enjoyable dining experience. We are happy to uncork the bottle for you.
Find Your Way
We can host your small parties or celebrations. We can also provide catering to your location.
Call For Details.
Now, you can order online for takeout/pick-up. Please select the location closest to you, where you would like to pick up.
Choose Location
Savor our homemade sauces and desserts. Food is cooked using fresh ingredients, and homemade spices.
Check Our Menu
Succulent grilled dishes
Savor every moment
Appetizing Signature Dishes
Gluten Free and Vegan Options
no gmo. all natural, healthy ingredients.

Our promise to you
30-day money back guarantee
HugeDomains provides a 100% satisfaction guarantee on every domain name that we sell through our website. If you buy a domain and are unhappy with it, we will accept the return within 30 days and issue a full refund – no questions asked.
Quick delivery of the domain
In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
Safe and secure shopping
Your online safety and security is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information.
We protect your information through SSL encryption technology, providing the safest, most secure shopping experience possible. Additionally, you may checkout with PayPal or Escrow.com.
FAQs
See more FAQs
How do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy?
Yes, you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process, it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain.
Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred.
For transfer instructions to GoDaddy, please
click here
.
How do I get the domain after the purchase?
Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar, NameBright.com, we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
What comes with the domain name?
Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee, however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.
Do you offer payment plans?
Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months.
See details
.
How do I keep my personal information private?
If you wish the domain ownership information to be private, add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public.
To add privacy protection to your domain, do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year, and then for a small fee for subsequent years.
Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update, and different registrars are faster than others. Usually your Whois information will be fully updated within two days.

name: A Little Thai Kitchen
raw_text:
A Little Thai Kitchen, Authentic Thai Food - Springdale Plaza, 1900 Greentree Road, Cherry Hill, NJ 08003 - (856) 489-1181
HOME
LUNCH SPECIALS
DINNER MENU
DIRECTIONS
PHOTO GALLERY
Lunch Specials
Monday — Friday Only
Eat In or Take Out
11:00 AM - 3:00 PM
Fixed Price Menu for
$10.95
per person
		Main courses will be served with choices 
of soups or appetizers. 3 courses (appertizer+soup+maincouse) for
$12.95
. Additional orders of soup or appetizer for
$2
each
Soups
Your Choice of Chicken or Vegetables with:
Lemongrass Soup
Coconut Soup
Spinach Clear Soup
Appetizers
Chicken or Vegetable Spring Rolls
Chicken or Vegetable Dumplings
Chicken or Tofu Satay
Corn Cakes
Entrées
Thai Basil
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
Stir fried with onion, bell pepper, baby corn, broccoli, carrot, sweet basil with home made chili paste.
Fried Rice
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
Thai fried rice with onions, tomatoes, broccoli, and carrots in Thai gravy sauce.
Basil Fried Rice
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
Thai fried rice with onions, tomatoes, broccoli, and carrots in Thai gravy sauce.
Pad Thai
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
Famous Thai rice noodles with egg, garlic, chopped shallots, tamarind, bean sprouts, peanuts, bean curd, chives, and sweet radishes.
Drunken Noodle
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
Stir-fried thick noodles in a sweet chili paste, with onions, sweet basil, bell peppers, and garlic.
Thai E-san BBQ Chicken
E-san Thai style grilled BBQ chicken serve with Thai sweet BBQ sauce, and papaya salad on the side.
Chicken Teriyaki
Grilled chicken breast served with teriyaki sauce with sesame seed and vegetables on the side.
Thai Grilled Pork Chop
Thai style marinated pork chop with Thai herbs, side of fresh salad and home made sauce.
Thai Chicken Salad
Grilled chicken breast sliced on top of green salad and side of peanut dressing.
Grilled Lamb Chop
Marinated lamb chop served with choices of green curry or panang curry.
Pad-See-Ew
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
Rice noodle stir- fried with egg, black pepper, garlic, soy sauce, and house vegetables.
Thai Curry
Red Curry
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
Very colorful red curry made with coconut milk, bamboo shoots, and basil leaves and mixed vegetable.
Green Curry
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
The famous curry made with chili green paste, coconut milk, green beans, basil leaves, and mixed vegetable.
Massaman Curry
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
Peanut & massaman curry containing potatoes, cashew nuts, and onions, in a creamy coconut sauce.
Panang Curry
Chicken, Beef, Vegetables and Tofu
Red coconut milk, carrots, bell pepper, peanuts, and lime leaves.
Desserts
Mango with Sticky Rice
$6.95
Sweet mango served with steamed sticky rice, sweetened coconut milk, and sesame seeds.
Fried Banana
$6.95
Banana buttered with coconut and rice flour, wheat flour, and served with honey or condensed milk.
Tiramisu Cake
$6.95

Thai Iced Tea
$4.00

$4.00
Coconut Juice
$4.00
Mango Juice
$4.00

TRIO BYOB DINNER MENU
SOUPS
SHRIMP DUMPLING SOUP ~ Light Soy Chicken Broth with Shrimp Filled Dumplings, Shrimp & Fresh Vegetables 5.5
“TOM YUM” ~ Spicy Thai Lemongrass Chicken Broth with Button Mushrooms  [SPICY] [GF}
Mushrooms 5.5 / Chicken 5.95 / Shrimp 6.5 / Seafood 7.5
“TOM KHA” ~ Coconut Milk Chicken Broth with Galanga Root, Lime Juice, and Cilantro.
Mushrooms 5.5 / Chicken 5.95 / Shrimp 7.5 / Seafood 8.95 [GF]
SALADS
TRIO HOUSE SALAD ~ Baby Greens, Asian Pear, Candied Walnuts, Cucumber, & Tomato with our Pickled Ginger Dressing [GF] [VEGT] / 9.95 Add Grilled Shrimp +6
THAI GRILLED BEEF SALAD ~ Grilled Flank Steak Tossed with a Mild Thai Chili-Lime Dressing over Baby Greens with Cucumber, Tomato, and Onion [GF] / 11.95  Add Grilled Shrimp +6
APPETIZERS
VEGETABLE SPRING ROLLS ~ Filled with Sliced Mushrooms, Glass Noodles, and Napa Cabbage Served with Sweet Chili Dipping Sauce [VEGT] / 7.5
CHICKEN SATAY ~ Marinated & Grilled Chicken Breast on Skewers Served with Thai Peanut Sauce & Cucumber Relish / 8.95 [GF]
THAI SAMOSAS ~ Filled with Potato, Edamame, Sliced Carrots and Spices, Served with our Thai Peanut Sauce [VEGT] / 8.95
BEGGARS POUCHES ~ Crispy Purses filled with Finely Minced Crab, Shrimp, & Veggies Tied with Pandan Leaf & Served with Sweet Chili Sauce / 10.95
STEAMED SEAFOOD DUMPLINGS ~ Minced Shrimp & Crab with Fresh Herbs served with a Ponzu Dipping Sauce / 10.95
BACON WRAPPED SHRIMP ROLLS ~ Shrimp Wrapped in Bacon and Spring Roll Pastry served with a Thai Sweet Chili Aioli on Side / 10.95
CHICKEN WINGS ~ Crispy Chicken Wings choose from 4 Options:
THAI – Kaffir Lime Leaf –  Curried Chili Glaze [SPICY
KOREAN – Spicy Gochujang, Soy, & Sesame Glaze [SPICY]
CHINESE – Lightly Dusted with Szechuan Pepper and Salt
FARANG – Buffalo Hot Sauce with Ranch [SPICY] / 10.95
GARLIC CHIVE DUMPLINGS ~ Pan Fried and Served with Ponzu Dipping Sauce [VEGT] / 8.95
FRIED CALAMARI ~ Salt Dusted Fried Calamari over Sliced Napa Cabbage with our Wasabi & Lime Dipping Sauce / 11.95
DINNER ENTRÉES
PROTEIN OPTIONS FOR ALL ITEMS BELOW
Seafood Medley (Shrimp, Scallops, Calamari & Mussels) 24.95 Scallops 20.95
Salmon 18.95,
Shrimp, Calamari, or Beef 17.95
Tofu & Vegetables, Just Vegetables, Just Tofu, Chicken, Pork, Lemongrass Pork Meatballs 16.95
THAI NOODLES
DRUNKEN NOODLES aka “PAD KEE MAU” ~ Wide Cut Fresh Rice Noodles Stir Fried with Egg, Bell Peppers, Onion, and Fresh Thai Basil in our Chili-Garlic Sauce with Protein of your Choice [SPICY]
“PAD THAI” ~ Rice Noodles with Egg, Chives, Bean Sprouts, Crushed Peanuts in a Light Tamarind Sauce with Protein of your Choice served with a Slice of Lime [GF]
“KHAO SOI” ~ A Northern Thai Style Coconut Red Curry with Egg Noodles and Protein of your Choice topped with Crispy Egg Noodles [SPICY]
“PAD SEE YEW” ~ Chinese Broccoli and Onions Stir Fried with Egg, Wide Cut Fresh Rice Noodles in a Sweet-Soy Sauce with Protein of your Choice
“PAD WOONSEN” ~ Glass Noodles Stir Fried with Egg, Mushrooms, Onions, and Peppers in a Light Soy-Garlic Sauce with Protein of your Choice Served with Jasmine Rice
VAN’S “CHOW FUN” ~ Wide Cut Rice Noodles, Bean Sprouts, Ginger, and Scallions Stir Fried in Light Soy & Cooking Wine with Protein of your Choice
THAI STIR FRY
GINGER STIR FRY aka “PAD KHING” ~ Fried Tofu with Mushrooms, Onions, Bell Peppers & Fresh Ginger in a Fermented Black Bean Sauce Served with your Choice of Jasmine or Brown Rice +1.5
THAI BASIL STIR FRY aka “PAD KRA PAO“ [SPICY] ~ Stir Fried Bell Peppers, Onions, & Thai Basil in a Spicy Chili Garlic Sauce. Served with your Choice of Jasmine or Brown Rice +1.5
PINEAPPLE FRIED RICE aka “KHAO PAD” ~ Jasmine White Rice Stir Fried with Egg, Peppers, Onion, Cashews, Pineapple, & Curry Powder [GF]
SPICY THAI BASIL FRIED RICE ~ Jasmine White Rice Stir Fried with Thai Chili, Egg, Fresh Tomato, Onion, & Fresh Thai Basil [GF] [SPICY]
THAI CURRY
CHOOSE FROM: GREEN ***, RED **, or YELLOW CURRY * [SPICY] ~ Coconut Milk Based Curry with Bamboo Shoots, Onions, Peppers, Napa Cabbage, Chinese Eggplant, and your Choice of Protein Served with Jasmine or Brown Rice +1.5 [GF]
ETC. ~ OTHER ENTREES
“PAD PAAG” aka STIR FRIED MIXED VEGETABLES ~ Stir Fried Fresh Vegetables in a light Soy-Garlic Sauce Served with your Choice of Jasmine 15.95 [VEGT]
BBQ PORK RIBS ~ Half Rack of Saint Louis Cut Spareribs Slow Cooked and Served with Asian Slaw & French Fries / 18.95
GRILLED STRIP STEAK ~ Grilled 8oz. First Cut Strip Steak, Served with a Red Wine Demi-Glace with Potatoes & Side Vegetable / 22.95
CRABCAKES ~ Served with Sriracha Aioli, French Fries & Vegetables / 20.95
BAKED SALMON ~ Seasoned & Pan Sauteed served with a Tamarind Sweet & Sour Sauce (on side) French Fries and Asian Slaw / 18.95 [GF]
VAN CHAU’S “KUNG PAO” ~ Szechuan Pepper with Bell Peppers, Water Chestnuts, and Onion in a Garlic-Soy-Chili Sauce: Fried Tofu & Vegetables / 16.95 [VEGT] Fried Sliced Chicken / 16.95, or Fried Calamari / 17.95
ROASTED CRISPY HALF DUCK ~ Served with our Seasonal Fruit Sauce or a Curry Sauce of your Choice (Red, Green, or Yellow) with Rice & Vegetables / 26.95 [GF]
BEVERAGES
SODAS ~ Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Ginger Ale / 2.5

name: Bhan Thai - Marlton
raw_text:
Bhan Thai – Best Thai food restaurant located in Mount Laurel and Marlton NJ. Within easy reach of Cherry Hill, Moorestown and Voorhees NJ. Healthy and fresh cooked food using natural ingredients and homemade spices and sauces.

Bhan Thai (Marlton)
1041 RT-73, Marlton, NJ 08053

Order Now
passion for excellence
Experience home-style Thai food, using only fresh, natural ingredients. Authentic fresh food in a really nice quaint environment. No GMO and many vegan and gluten-free options to crave for. Tina and Ava bring you culinary art from multi-generations of experience and passion for food.
Bring your own beer or wine for an enjoyable dining experience. We are happy to uncork the bottle for you.
Find Your Way
We can host your small parties or celebrations. We can also provide catering to your location.
Call For Details.
Now, you can order online for takeout/pick-up. Please select the location closest to you, where you would like to pick up.
Choose Location
Savor our homemade sauces and desserts. Food is cooked using fresh ingredients, and homemade spices.
Check Our Menu

Savor every moment

Gluten Free and Vegan Options
no gmo. all natural, healthy ingredients.

Customizable kid-sized stir-frys and salads for kids 12 and under.
All kids meals include a side of seasonally selected fruit.
Garlic Butter + Parm
Freshly made egg white noodles tossed with garlic butter sauce and covered with shaved parmesan. Includes a side of seasonally selected fruit.
(690 cal.)
Create Your Own Stir-Fry
Create your own kid-sized stir-fry with brown rice or freshly made egg white noodles plus all of our standard stir-fry add-in options. Includes a side of seasonally selected fruit.
Create Your Own Salad
Create your own salad with fresh greens, protein, veggies, and dressing. Includes a side of seasonally selected fruit.
Nutritional Information
and
all the fine print
Stir-Fry Platters
Served hot with additional sauce on the side. Platters serve 6.
Spicy Garlic
choice of base, roasted chicken, bell peppers, broccoli, red onions, pineapples, parsley, spicy garlic sauce.
Sweet Soy Five Spice
brown rice*, turkey meatballs, green beans, red onions, sesame seeds, sweet soy five spice sauce.

*brown rice suggested for this dish
Sesame Garlic
choice of base, roasted steak, mushrooms, broccoli, scallions, sesame seeds, sesame garlic sauce
Red Coconut Curry
choice of base, roasted tofu, pineapples, jalapeños, carrots, scallions, cilantro, red coconut curry sauce.
Sriracha Tahini
Your choice of base with roasted chicken, roasted chicken, mushrooms, red onions, organic baby spinach, scallions, chili flakes, toasted sesame seeds, and our sriracha tahini sauce.
Salad Platters
Served cold with dressing on the side + complimentary foccacia bread. Small platters serve 6 and large platters serve 12
Cobb
Chopped romaine, roasted chicken, hard boiled egg, crispy bacon, apples, grape tomatoes, avocado, and crumbled blue cheese, served with white balsamic vinaigrette.
gluten free
Cold Sesame Noodle
Chilled freshly made egg white noodles, roasted shrimp, shredded green cabbage, carrots, edamame, scallions, cucumbers, jalapeños, pineapple, crispy onions, and cilantro, served with our Asian sesame ginger dressing
Loaded Greek
Chopped romaine, roasted chicken, grape tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, crunchy chickpeas, tzatziki, Kalamata olives, banana peppers, and feta, served with our roasted garlic red wine vinaigrette
gluten free
Kale Chicken Caesar
Curly kale with roasted chicken, grape tomatoes, cucumbers, seasoned croutons, shaved parmesan, and seasoned breadcrumbs. Served with classic caesar dressing.
Steakhouse Chopped
Chopped romaine, roasted steak, crispy bacon, grape tomatoes, red onions, crumbled blue cheese, and croutons, served with our ranch dressing
Buffalo Chicken Salad
Chopped romaine, roasted chicken, roasted cauliflower, carrots, celery, crispy jalapeños, crumbled blue cheese, all topped with our spicy buffalo sauce, and a drizzle of ranch dressing.
Desserts and Beverages
We offer all of the desserts and beverages that you need to complete your meal.
Individual Honeybars
Dessert: hg style. Individually prepared honeybar with fresh fruit and local honey. Minimum of 6 per catering order.
Brownie
Our guaranteed crowd pleaser: served individually or by the platter to serve 12
Beverage Bundle
We should all drink more water. This bundle serves 6 and includes assorted cans of La Croix sparkling water and bottles of spring water.
Soft Drink Bundle
Add a little more flavor to your beverage menu with assorted bottled soft drinks. Serves 6.

Davion Vang
I admire this spot! They provide great dishes, their menu is large, The chief cook in that spot is very experienced, I enjoy very much trying all their dishes. The food is always fresh, the attitude towards the visitors  is agreeable. I often eat in this restaurant and I not even once was unhappy. Highly recommended.
Jad Petersen
We enjoy hanging out. Yesterday we came to this superb place which we didn’t know before. We had a delightful experience there with excellent meal and  an experienced stuff and a talented chief cook. We put this fine restaurant in our list  and we will definitely visit again soon. We deeply recommend.
Susan Mangigian
We always feel like we are visiting friends when the owner greets us.  Great food, nice bar.

name: Sharetea Fatty Panda
raw_text:
Sharetea Fatty Panda MENU (update September 2025)
Skip to content
Sharetea Fatty Panda
HOME
ABOUT
MENU
PHOTOS
REVIEWS
Sharetea Fatty Panda MENU
The menu was updated in September 2023.
For more information, please contact the following phone number:
+1 267-830-8888
Exploring Sharetea Fatty PandaDelights
Prepare yourself for a culinary adventure like no other as we invite you to explore Sharetea Fatty Panda’s exquisite menu. The menu is a testament to the commitment to delivering authentic Taiwanese flavors, innovative creations, and a tantalizing array of options that cater to every palate.
From the comfort of the restaurant, you’ll embark on a journey through the vibrant and diverse world of Taiwanese cuisine. Join Sharetea Fatty Panda as it navigates the culinary treasures that await within the menu.
Beloved Menu Favorites
Sharetea Fatty Panda boasts a diverse menu filled with delightful options, but some items stand out as true crowd-pleasers. These beloved dishes and beverages have become favorites among the patrons and are essential experiences for anyone looking to savor the best of an offerings:
Brown Sugar Milk Tea
This classic milk tea is a sweet and creamy delight made with fresh milk, brown sugar, and tapioca pearls. It’s a comforting and indulgent choice suitable for any occasion.
Mango Slushie
Escape the heat with the refreshing mango slushie. Crafted with fresh mango, ice, and milk, it’s the perfect choice to cool down on a scorching day.
Taro Milk Tea
Indulge in the unique and nutty flavor of the taro milk tea, prepared with fresh taro root, milk, and sugar. It’s a sweet sensation that’s sure to please the palate.
Popcorn Chicken
Satisfy your cravings with the popular popcorn chicken. Bite into tender, breaded chicken pieces fried to a golden brown perfection. Customize your experience with a dipping sauce of your choice, whether it’s sweet and sour or plum sauce.
Squid Balls
Experience the chewy and flavorful delight of the Squid Balls, a beloved Taiwanese snack. Served with your choice of sauce, such as sweet and sour or chili sauce, these little bites are a savory treat.
Mochi
Indulge your sweet tooth with a Mochi, sweet and chewy Japanese rice cakes that come in various flavors. It often filled with luscious red bean paste or creamy ice cream, making them a delightful treat.
Culinary Inspiration
Sharetea Fatty Panda’s menu is a blend of Taiwanese tradition, innovation, quality, customer feedback, and global culinary influences. The menu focuses on capturing the essence of Taiwanese flavors, using fresh ingredients and techniques, and incorporating the feedback of customers.
The restaurant’s commitment to delivering exceptional Taiwanese cuisine is fueled by a dynamic fusion of tradition, innovation, quality, and customer feedback. The menu is a testament to the restaurant’s dedication to delivering exceptional dining experiences, ensuring that every dish and beverage is a product of careful craftsmanship and passionate exploration of flavors and textures.

MAKE YOUR MEAL

THESE 5 TIPS
ENJOYABLE
Use metal tongs provided to move raw meat on the grill.
1
Use your chopsticks to remove cooked meat
from the grill.
Do not load the grill up with too many meats
2
at the same time. This increases the risk of fire.
Meats that are higher in fat content
3
(especially Toro Beef and Pork) should be cooked
around the edges of the grill.
Table sauces go in your sauce tray and not on the grill.
While meat is cooking on the grill, do not add any table
4
sauces on it. For best flavor, add the sauces when your
meats are cooked and on your plate!

5
or what to order? Please ask your server!

Our wine list changes with some frequency based on availability, new vintage releases and other factors. The list below is a sample of what you will find on our wine list.
Sparkling & White Wines
Prosecco
Pasqua "Romeo & Juliet", Treviso, Italy DOC
$
50
Sparkling Rose
Cuvée 89 by GRUET, New Mexico, NV
$
45
Champagne
Moet et Chandon, BRUT, France NV
$
120
Chardonnay, CK Mondavi, California
Delightfully crisp with aromas of lemon & citrus, flavors of apple and pear mingle with a hint of oak
$
35
CHARDONNAY, DECOY BY DUCKHORN, NAPA VALLEY, CA
Tantalizing, vibrant aromas of Fuji apple, ripe pear and lemon zest. Orchard fruit and citrus flavors, refreshing acidity and hints of caramelized French oak
$
59
Chardonnay, McBride Sisters, Central Coast, CA
Aromas of lemon curd and honey, pineapple and ripe pear. Soft and balanced texture, with a slight hint of toasty oak. Complex without being heavy. Great with salmon, chicken, shrimp and salads
$
50
Viognier, Peraino Estate, Lodi, CA
Aromas of honeysuckle, guava and butter with a hint of toasty brioche bread. Lush flavors of ripe apricots, lychee, vanilla and flowers balanced by flavors of peaches and butter
$
35
Riesling, Charles Smith Wines, Kung Fu Girl, Washington State
White peach, mandarin orange and apricot are delivered with a core of minerality that makes this dry Riesling shimmer with energy and freshness.
$
34
Riesling, Black Girl Magic, Mc Bride Sisters, California
Intense aromas of honey, apricot, jasmine and tangerine followed by bright citrus and tropical flavors that hint of guava and pineapple. Softly sweet with a bright, tangy, mouthwatering finish A real food wine - perfect with fried chicken!
$
47
White Blend, Melange by Waterbrook, Columbia Valley, Washington State
Perfect, off-dry summer blend of Muscat, Viognier, Riesling, Pinot Gris, Sauvignon Blanc & Chardonnay. Aromas of pineapple and honeysuckle lead to sweet flavors of white peach, dried papaya vanilla & key lime pie
$
36
Rose & Red Wines
ROSE OF MOURVEDRE, CLINE CELLARS, CA
Aromas of fresh plum, strawberry, and watermelon with layers of cherry and a hint of plum on the palate. Full bodied and full flavored - a favorite year after year.
$
42
Pinot Noir, Block 9, "Caiden's Vineyard", California
Ripe cherry and berry flavors. Silky in the mouth, good body, seductive wild cherries and a hint of sandalwood
$
39
Cabernet Sauvignon, CK Mondavi, California
Deep red color, intense flavors of cherry and blackberry, hint of oak and a silky finish.
$
35
Cabernet Blend, Chappellet, Mountain Cuvee, Napa Valley, California
Concentrated fruit and spice with layers of red currant, cassis, cinnamon, vanilla and clove, along with hints of earthy forest floor. Predominantly Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot with Petit Verdot, Malbec & Cabernet Franc
$
85
Malbec, Broken Earth Winery, "Limited Release", Paso Robles, CA
Dark red fruits with spice and pepper notes on the palate with balancing acidity. Made from estate grown fruit aged in barrel for 12 months.
$
36
Sommelier's Selections
Special wines in limited quantity.
Chardonnay, Rombauer Vineyards, Napa Valley, CA, 2019
A Wine & Spirits Magazine Top 10 Chardonnay. Buttery richness to luscious spiced apple tart and baked pear flavors. Ground nutmeg lingers into the broad, plush finish with powerful toasty notes.
$
85
Sauvignon Blanc, Chalk Hill, Sonoma County, CA, 2019
Exotic, vibrant and fresh. Full-flavored and well-balanced from a combination of stainless and French oak barrel treatment. Floral notes, honeydew melon, lemon and white pepper aromas with guava, mango & grapefruit on the palate.
$
50
Merlot, Duckhorn Vineyards, "Three Palms Vineyard", Napa Valley, CA 2018
The benchmark for New World Merlot. Intense, complex, layered flavors. Aromas of huckleberry, black cherry, chocolate and fig. Voluptuous fruit and earthy undertones on the palate. A rich and remarkably long finish.
$
185
Cabernet Sauvignon, Crossbarn by Paul Hobbs, Sonoma County, CA 2018
Aromas of redcurrant, black olive tapenade, and hints of wet stone. Juicy red fruits burst on the palate with a youthful intensity, with balanced acidity, fine-grained tannins, and a lengthy finish. 90 PTS, Robert Parker, The Wine Advocate
$
95
CABERNET SAUVIGNON, TREFETHEN VINEYARDS, RESERVE, OAK KNOLL DIST, NAPA 2018
“…nearly perfect…a monumental wine…” – Wine Enthusiast - Aromas of dense plum jam, currant, sage, hints of clove-scented leather. Layers of expressive, ripe cherry, cacao, and black fruit, rich mouthfeel, supple tannins.
$
195
CABERNET SAUVIGNON, FRANK FAMILY VINEYARDS, NAPA VALLEY, CA 2018
Robust, balanced, complex - a blend of dark berry, generous oak notes, clove, and nutmeg. Supple, full-bodied with a punch of power, ripeness, and elegance from start to finish.
$
110
We choose all of our wines with care and an emphasis on offering great value - wines that over-deliver and complement our food.
Vintages change and sometimes we don't know until the wines arrive at our door. We make every effort to keep our wine list up-to-date.
Unfortunately, many of our purveyors continue to experience supply chain challenges. We apologize in advance if we do not have your first choice.
We have a changing selection of craft cocktails. Below are just a few of our favorites.
SOUTH's Signature Cocktails
Originals and twists on the classics.
The SOUTH Sazerac
Our twist on the classic made with Dad's Hat Pennsylvania Rye Whiskey, Martell Cognac and a spritz of Absinthe. Served chilled, up, with a twist of lemon. The original Sazerac was crowned the official cocktail of New Orleans in 2008.
$
15
SOUTHern Nobility
Uncle Nearest Small Batch Tennessee Whiskey, sarsaparilla syrup and lemon juice.
$
16
Ode to Zanzibar Blue
Empress 1908 Gin, ruby red grapefruit and lime juices, ginger beer and a twist of lime.
$
12
SOUTHern Strawberry Jam
Bulleit Bourbon, fresh strawberries, strawberry jam and freshly squeezed lemon juice.
$
16
We're heavily focused on local craft beer because Philadelphia and the surrounding area have so many fantastic breweries.
DRAFT BEERS
Local & Seasonal
Neshaminy Creek Brewing WAREHOUSE Mexican-Style Lager
2-row and Munich malt, flaked maize, Herkules and Hallertauer hops. Clean, grainy malt character. subtle sweetness and a crisp, dry finish. IBU 18 | 4.5% ABV (16 oz)

6

Bright citrus notes that drift into a tropical fruit character and finishes with a touch of apricot. 35 IBU | 6% ABV (16 oz)

Great warm weather beer brewed with fresh ginger, lemon zest and coriander. Dry, lightly spicy and infuse with citrus. 5.2% ABV (16 oz)

7.50

Low bitterness and lots of hop flavor. Dry-hopped entirely with Citra hops. 85 IBU | 7.5% ABV (12 oz)
